32b4(1): 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsod pa de ni bar nas/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod par bya ba ste/ mngon sum du dag pa yin no// de la mngon
32b5(1): sum ji lta bu zhe na/ ngan sum ni gnyis te/ gang zag mngon sum dang chos mngon sum mo// gang zag mngon sum gang zhe na/ gang dag gis rtsod pa de zhi bar byed pa dang / gang da/ 
32b6(1): gi rtsod pa ni bar bya ba de thams cad 'dus shing mngon sum du gyur pa 'di ni gang zag mngon zhes bya'o// chos mngon sum gang zhe na/ son pa'i bstan pa gang chos gang dang
32b7(1): 'dul ba gang gis rtsod de ni bar 'gyur ba'i ston pa'i bstan pa de dang / chos de dang 'dul khaM des rtsod pa'i pa zhi bar byed pa 'di ni chos mngon sum zhes bya'o// gal te mdo/ 
32b8(1): rdzi dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsod pa dezhi bar byed ma nus na/ de rnams kyis rtsod pa srid pa'i dge slong nyid la gtad par bya'o// rtsod pa sang pami
33a1(1): dge sang gis gnas na dge slong gnas bstan gnas bstan+da gang yang rung ba 'am/ bshes gnyen can bshes gnyen n+danA gang yang rung ba 'am/ 
33a2(1): gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa de la gtad par bya zhing / rgan rims ci lta ba bzhin la brjod par bya ste/ gnas brtan dag gcig cod pa 'di ni gnas ga ge mo zhig
33a3(1): ga ni 'di las byung nas/ dus 'di srid cig lon te/ rtsod pa de sems la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis zhi bar byed ma nus sam/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa
33a4(1): dang / dge 'dun gyis kyang maspyod nas/ des kyang dge slong gsal ba rnams bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/  de rnams kyis kyang
33a5(1): dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba bskos pa las/ dge slong gsal ba bas kyang gsal ba rnams kyis kyang ma nus nas/ de rnams kyis dge 'dun la gtad pa las
33a6(1): dge 'dun gyis bdag dge slong ming n+des bgyi brtsod pa sred par bskos nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sred pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas bstan dang bcas so sor thar pa
33a7(1): dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun la gtad pa las/ gnas bstan dang bcas so sor thar pa dang bcas pa'i dge 'an gyis ni bar ma skyod nas/ des kyang bdag dge slong rtsod pa sred pa ming
33a8(1): 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtad nas/ bdag dge slong rtsod pa sred pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ rtsod pa 'di mdo sde dang 'dul dang ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la gtad pa
33b1(1): dang / mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang / ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis kyang mnus nas/ de rnams kyis kyang dge slong rtsod pa sred pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gtad nas/ bdag dge/ 
33b2(1): srong rtsod pa sred pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas rtsod pa 'di gnas brtan gyi sa 'di nas bzung ste/ cod pa 'dri ji nam gyis mthar phyin gyi bar du ni bar mdzad gsol zhes brjod par
33b3(1): bya'o// ngas dge slong gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong ga rI sa brtan gyis rgol ba dang ba'i dge slong rnams so shing stobs na/ bdag gi ram/ 
33b4(1): bya ste/ ba'i lci ba stobs na ma yin no/ 'dag cha la stobs na ma yin zhing / 'don pa dang 'dri ba dang yang 'byed du mi zhugs ste/ gzhan du na mdun nam rgyu ba du 'dug nas// 
33b5(1): rlig 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag ma 'thab shig/ mtshang ma 'gru shig/ 'thab mo ma byed cig ma 'gyed cig/ de ci'i bye re zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med
33b6(1): kyi/ 'on kyang gcig rgya la gcig bam par 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa la gnyis ka rgyal ba med kyis 'on kyang gcig rgyal gcig pham par 'gyur ro zhes bya zhing / dge slong
33b7(1): khanas bcan gyis snyan pa'i bstan pa chos 'dril bas ca dang dzin par bya'o// dag sdang gnas brtan gyis cad pa den+ti bar byas na/ legs par zhi bar byas par brjod
33b8(1): bar bya'o//  dge sang dag ma ma nasum du 'dul bar bas pa ni ci dang zhi bar byed pa yinan pa/ de ltar na bcig gis cad pa rnams kyi sa// mngon sum du 'dum bar ches
34a1(1): pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba de nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag tshul shing mang po brang ba ni rtsod pa ni bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na
34a2(1): 'di kha cig gi rtsod pa ni 'di lta ste/ gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i rtsod pa nye bar byed pas 'dul ba dang ni ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin te na na/ skam la gnas pa nas bzungs
34a3(1): ste/ gnas brtan gyi bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te dge slong gnas brtan gyis rtsod pa de ni par byed mi nus na/ rjod pa de rtsod pa sred pa'i dge slong de nyid gtang
34a4(1): pa bya'o// des kyang rtsod pa de dge 'dun la gtad par bya'o// dge 'dun gyis rtsod pa de gang tshul shing mang po brang ba'i rtsod pa de ni bas ni bar bya'o// rgyu lngas gang tshul shing mang
34a5(1): po len pa'i rtsod pa zhi ba ni rngub pa dang / gdug pa dang / dam pa dang / dbye ba'i bsam pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin no// nub po ci lta bu zhe na/ rgol
34a6(1): ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis rtsub po yin te/ de ltar na rngub po can yin no// gdug pa ni lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams gdug pa dang / 
34a7(1): rnams par gnon pa yin te/ de ltar na gdug pa can yin no// dam pa ji lta bu zhe na/ rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis dam por bzung ba yin te
34a8(1): de ltar na dam po can yin no// dbye ba'i bsam pa ji lta bu zhe na/ dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu pa ni lasa'i byed par byed pa gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shin tu rab/ 
34b1(1): du bzung ba yin te/ de ltar na dbye ba'i bsam pa can yin no// sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ci lta bu zhe na/ sam la gnas pa nas bzung nas/ gnas brtan gyi bar
34b2(1): gyiskye/ de ltar na sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin te/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pas na gang tshul shing mang po blang ba'i zhi ni rtsub pa dang gdug pa dang dam po dang de bye
34b3(1): ba'i bsam pa dang / sbyor ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ba can yin no// de na tshul gang 'jim pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'drim pa
34b4(1): ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang
34b5(1): 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / tshul shing 'jims pa de ngam 'brims pa mi shes ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'drim par ma bsres ni bsko bar
34b6(1): mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong tshul shing 'drim par ma bsngos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// 
34b7(1): lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas mI 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / tshul shing 'drims pa dang ma brim
34b8(1): pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong 'di dang tshul shing 'drim par ma bskos ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// tshul shing 'arnam
35a1(1): pa ni bzhi ste/ ga ni gang zhe na/ sra ba dang / mngon pa dang / rna drung du shub pa dang / gas pa dang / dge 'dun thams cad pa'o// swa
35a2(1): ba'i tshul shing 'brim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul shing 'brim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di ni dge slong ginas brtan rab tu mang po dang dag ni chos
35a3(1): ma yin par smra la/ dge slong gsar bu nyung zad gcig ni chos smra bas/ d+hI gal te bdag gis tshul shing mngon par bris na/ dge slong gsar bu dge slong gnas brtan
35a4(1): rnams kyi rjes su 'byed pa rnams/ kyi chos ma yin pa'i tshul shrIng+ka rab tu snying po len par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod kyis/ ma la bdag gis tshul shing sras
35a5(1): te brim mo snyam nas/ de tshul shing sabs nas brim pa ste/ 'di ni tshul shing brim pa zhes bya'o// mngon pa'i chul shing 'azim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lha sde tshul brim pa'i
35a6(1): dge slong 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas 'di na dge slong gnas bstan rab tu mang po dag ni chos spru la/ dge slong gsar bu nyung zad gcig ni chos ma yin pa smra bas/ gal te
35a7(1): bdag gis tshul shing sras te brims nas/ dge slong gsar bu rnams chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len par 'gyur ba'i bayin pa'i gnas de yod kyis/ mA la bdag gis tshul shing
35a8(1): mngon pa zim mo// bdag gis tshul shing gsal bar brims nas/ dge slong gar bu dge slong gnas bcan rnams kyi rjesu byed pa rnams kyi tshul shing rab tu ma
35b1(1): bo len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do snyam nas/ de tshul shing mngon par thim pa ste/ 'di ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi tshul shing brim pa zhes bya'o// 
35b2(1): drung du shub pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing zim pa gang nesar+b+ba/ 'di lta sde tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong gis rna drung du gtugs te shu bsal tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi mkhan
35b3(1): pos chos kyi tshul shing zangs kyis khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing longs shig/ khyod kyi slob dpon dang / mkhyen po gcig pa dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / 'bebs
35b4(1): par smra ba dang / spos 'drin dang / 'grogs bshes kyis chos kyi tshul shing brangs kyis/ khyod kyis kyang chos kyi tshul shing longs shig rjes smras pa ste/ 'di ni rna drung du/ 
35b5(1): bshubs pa dang bcas pa'i tshul shing 'jim pa zhes bya'o// dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshul shing 'drim pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul shing 'drim pa'i dge slong 'di snyam du se
35b6(1): te/ gas 'di na dge slong nad pa rab tu mang bas gal te bdag gis dge 'dun ma tshogs shing ma 'dus par la shing 'drim na/ dge slong rab tu mang pos chos ma yin pa'i chu
35b7(1): shing len par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yid kyis/ ma la bdag gis dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang tshul shing thim par bya'o sam nas/ dge
35b8(1): 'dun thams cad tshigs shing 'dus pa dang tshul shing thim par bya'o snyam nas/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'dus pa dang / tshul shing bathim pa ste/ 'di
36a1(1): ni dge 'dun thams cad pa'i tshul shing 'jim pa zhes byas/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu dang chos kyi bcu'o// chos ma
36a2(1): yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/ chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa dang / mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa dang / chung bas kyang chung bas tshul shing len pa
36a3(1): dang / dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa dang / sbyar ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa dang / rten kha lo sbyar ba dang mi mthun pas tshul shing len pa dang / 
36a4(1): tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye yang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu meng pos chos ma yin pa smra ba gyur kyang
36a5(1): ci mi rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshal zhes blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur ba shes pa bzhin du tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing len pas dge slong
36a6(1): rab tu mang po dag chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul tha~Mng len pa'o// 'dul lag no// ma bu gaN+DI b+ha/ bkri pa bdun nu dgra pA/ 
36a7(1): sa mA n+de ma ma zhing yin pa du ma/ 'dul bang mthun gyi ma yin pas tshul zhing lanu sa// // bu mchis ma yin pas rgyu la zhing len nan/ mi mthun
36b1(1): nga lan pa'i/ rdzu nan/ blarnam par byung dang / bzugs par bya basbyin sbyar nas rdul zhing len pas/ da buni chung bsakyang rgyang bas tshul zhing len pa
36b2(1): nen/ dbye bar byed pa'i gni bcu pa ni las 'byed pa'i gang yang rung ba zhig legs par shin tu rab tu bzung ba de bu ni dge 'dun dbye ba'i bam pas tshul shing len
36b3(1): pa yin no// sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ skam la gnas pas ma yin pa nas bzung nas gnas brtan gyis ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar
36b4(1): du ste/ de lta bu ni sbyor ba gzhan du ma gyur pas/ tshul shing len pa yin no// rten kha la sbyar ba dang / mi snun pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na dge slong mdo sde 'dzin
36b5(1): pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / ma mo 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dgra chos 'dul ba'i 'ji la chen pa dang / kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ste/ de rnams lam brtag
36b6(1): par tshul shing len pa ste/ 'di lta bu rten khA lo sgyur ba dang mi snun pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam
36b7(1): pas nul shing len pa ji lta bu zher/ tshul shing zings pas dge'i dun dbye bar gyur kyang cim rung sa mdu bsams nas/ tshul shing len pa sti dal bu ni tshul shing zangs
36b8(1): pas dge 'dun dbye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing lon pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang tshim
37a1(1): rung sam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin bzangs nas/ 'jug par gyur kyang
37a2(1): ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu na tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing med pa yin no// tshul
37a3(1): shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar gyur par shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur pa shes shing de ltar bsams/ 
37a4(1): nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs byas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur ba shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa yin no// chul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang
37a5(1): po chos ma yin pa sba bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas 'jug par 'gyur
37a6(1): shes shing / de ltar bams nas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing len pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa sba bar 'gyur bar shes bzhin du tshul shing len pa ste/ 
37a7(1): 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing len pa bcu yin no// chos kyis tshul shing len pa bcu gang zhe na/ chos kyis tshul shing len pa dang / mthun pas tshul shing len pa
37a8(1): dang / chung bas kyang chung bas ma yin pas tshul shing len pa dang / mi 'byed pa'i bsams pas tshul shing len pa dang / sbyor ba gnan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa
37b1(1): dang / rten kho lo sbyar ba dang / snun pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge slong 'dun dbye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / 
37b2(1): tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing brang du pas dge 'dun dbye bar gyur par
37b3(1): mi shes sa tshul shing len pa dang / tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba'i mi shes pas tshul shing len pa dang / chung ba bas kyang / 
37b4(1): rlung ba ba ma yin pas tshul shing len ji lta dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur bar mi shes pas tshul zhing len pa dang / bu zhe na/ bsdam par bya ba
37b5(1): ma yin pa dang // bshags par bya ba ma yin no snyam du bsams nas tshul shing len pa ste// de lta bu ni rlung ba bas kyang chung ba ma yin pas tshul shing len
37b6(1): pa yin no// mi dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na// dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi las dbye bar byed pa'i gzhi gang yang rung
37b7(1): ba legs par shin tu rab tu ma bzung ste// de lta bu ni mi dbye ba'i bsam pas tshul shing len pa yin no// sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pa tshul shing len pa dza
37b8(1): lta bu zhe na// skam la gnas pa gnas bzung nas// gnas bstan gyi bar du ste// de lta bu ni sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pas tshul shing len pa yin no// 
38a1(1): rjen kha lo sgyur ba dang snun pas nul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na// dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / 
38a2(1): mamo 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni chos 'dul ba 'dril rten pa dang / kha lo sbyar ba zhes bya ba ste// de rnams la brtags nas tshul shing len pa de lta bu ni rten khal
38a3(1): bsgyur ba dang bstun pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun bgyi bar gyur kyang ci ma rung skam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na// tshul
38a4(1): shing blangs pas dge 'dur dbye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung skam pa de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/ de lta bu ni tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam
38a5(1): bas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra bar ma gyur kyang ci ma rung skam pas tshul shing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 
38a6(1): tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs te// 'jug par ma gyur kyang tsam rung sam pas tshul shing len pa ste// de ltar bu re tshul shing
38a7(1): blangs pas dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin// pa smra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pas tshul shing len pa yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar
38a8(1): 'gyur ba'i shes pas tshul shing len pa ji lta zhen/ tshul zhing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur ba mi shes shing // de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste/ 
38b1(1): de lta bu ni nul shing blangs pas dge 'dun dbye bar 'gyur ba mi shes pas tshul shing ler ba yin no// tshul shing blangs pas dge 'dun rab tu mang po chos ma yin/ 
38b2(1): bsdu bar mi shes par tshul zhing len pa ji lta bu zhe na/ tshul shing blangs pas dge slong rab ma tu mang po chos ma yin pa blangs nas/ spyod par mi shes
38b3(1): shing de ltar mi sems pas tshul shing len pa ste// de lta bu'i tshul shing blangs pas/ dge slong rab tu mang po chos ma yin pa smra ba mi shes pas// 
38b4(1): tshul shing len pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyi tshul shing len pa bcu yin no// ngas dge slong tshul shing 'drim pa'i kun du spyod pas chos bca' bar bya ste/ 
38b5(1): dge slong tshul shing 'drim pa'i tshul shing rnam pa nyis bsham par bya ste/ chos kyi tshul shing dang chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing ngo // 
38b6(1): chos kyi tshul shing len pa rnams la ye med pa/ kyas kyog med pa// kyar kyor med pa/ kha dog bzang po reg na bde bar
38b7(1): bya'o// chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams ni ya yo dang // kyab kyog dang / kyar kyor dang // kha dog ngan pa dang / 
39a1(1): / des ma ngas la du ma sa la ma kya rdul zhing
39a2(1): / ga pa ma yi pa du ma zung sanas/ dge 'dun ci gnas brten gyi mdur du 'jus te/ 
39a3(1): ga ba / ma men pa'i tshul zhing rnams kyis brlags pa ma tshan pa badzad par/ gnas brten
39a4(1): kyi tshul zhing lags/  lo ma mchis pa/ wAg kyi ga ma ma smrab/ kyar rtsor ma mchis pa/ 
39a5(1): 'das pa nga ba yin pade ba legs kyis pa sa / 'di can nas mayin pa'i tshul shA lags te// la ma dang / ga/ 
39a6(1): / bdas nal dzin rnami pa ba'ags bcasapal te ces ma yin pa'i tsha
39b1(1): shing gang na ba der logs su lag pa bzer na/ tshig dang po la sbyin par mi bya// gnyis pa la sbyin par bya/ 
39b2(1): gsum pa la sbyin par mi bya ste// dge 'dun gnas bstan gyis 'dul ba dang // 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi lhung ba bshags par bya'o// 
39b3(1): de bzhin du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar gyi mdun du 'dug nas chos kyi tshul shing rnams kyis bsngags pa dang // chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing rnams kyi
39b4(1): bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ste// 'di dag ni chos kyi tshul shing legs te// ye yo mchis pa/ kyag kyog ma mchis pa// kyar kyor mar chis
39b5(1): pa// kha dog bzang po rig na bde ba lags kyis bzhes shig/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing legs te// pha pho dang // sdug kyog dang // kyar
39b6(1): kyor dang // kha dog ngam pa reg na mi bde ba lags na bzhes shig/ gal te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gang na bder log su lag pa bzed nas/ tshig dang po la sbyin pa mi \u0f7f gnyis pa
40a1(1): pa la skyed par mi bya/ gsum pa la sbyir par mi bAste/ de bzhin du dge 'dun gas dbus 'dul ba dang 'gal ba'i nyes byas kyi ltung ba bshags
40a2(1): par bya'o// gal te rlos kyi tshul shing nyung bar gyur na/ kun shes ko'i drin+ya'i tshul shing blangs par bya'o// gal te chos kyi tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur na/ 
40a3(1): yang de ldan 'di lta ste/ chos kyis rtsod de nye bar miSh+Ti n+dan// de ltar rtsod pa de na par byas pa lnga ge lA te 'ga' zhig sbyor sngogs byed ni/ ltung byed du 'gyur ro// de bzhin dugal
40a4(1): te chos ma yin pa'i tshul shing gcig gis lhag par gyur de ni yang 'di lta na yang 'di lta ste/ chos ma yin pa'i rtso pa nye bar ni bar byas pa yin no// de ltar rtsod pa de bzhi par byas pa las
40a5(1): gal te 'ga' zhig sbyor sngogs byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// de ltar na gang tshul shing mang po byung ba rjod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na kha gcig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste gang tshul
40a6(1): shing mang po blangs pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas/ 'dul ba dang nye bAr zhi ba yin no// dge slong 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa la rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa mnyes kyis dul bar bya zhing zhi bar bya nye bar zhi
40a7(1): bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / gang tshul shing mang po blangs pas so// dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa la zhi bar byed pa'i chos gsum gyis
40a8(1): 'dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya par bye'ono bar byar// gsum gang ne/ mang gsum du 'dul ba dang / dran pas 'dul ba dang / mabyas pas 'dul ba'o// dge slong dag / 
40b1(1): ltar na mngon gsum gyis 'dul ba ni brtsod pa ni bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na ni 'di ni kha gcig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste mngon gsum dro ba'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang ni ba
40b2(1): dang nye bar zhi ba yin no zhe na/ skam la gnas pa nas gzungs nas/ gnas rten gyi bar gyis gong ma bzhin du ste/ dge slong dag de ltar na mngon gsum du 'dul ba ni rtso pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ 
40b3(1): ji ltar na ni 'di kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon gsum du 'dul ba ste brtsod pa ni bar byed pas 'dul ba dang ni ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin no// dge slong dag ji ltar na dran pas 'dul
40b4(1): kha ning dartsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na ni 'di ni kha gcig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ dran pas 'dul ba'i rtsod pa ni bur byed pas 'dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin/ 
40b5(1): dper na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur btab pa de la dge slong rnams gleng bar byed de/ gzhi des gleng ba ngo tsha'o// zhes bya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams
40b6(1): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis gyad bu nor dang gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la dran pas 'dul bar 'os
40b7(1): pa byin cig/ sbyin pa ni 'di ltar na bya ste/ gnas mal bshams pa la gan+d+hi brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun
40b8(1): par 'gyur ba dang / gyad bu nor gyis bla gos phrag gcig tu gzar nas/ rgan rims ji lta bzhin 'dud ba byas la/ rgan pa'i mthar cog tsog por 'dug nas/ thal mo sbyar de tshig 'di
41a1(1): skad ces dge 'dun pa rnams gsan du gsan du gsol/ bdag gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur pa btab pas/ bdag la dge slong rnams
41a2(1): gni des gleng bar bgyid de/ bdag la gzhi des gleng bar bgyi ba dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa blugs brtse ba can blugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ 
41a3(1): bdag kyang du nor la dran pas 'dul ba bsul dugasal/ de sa nga lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// de dge 'dun btsun pa/ 
41a4(1): rnams gsar du gsol// gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pa'i skur pa btab pas/ 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar bgyid de// 'di gzhi des gleng par bgyid pa
41a5(1): dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis gyad bu nor
41a6(1): la dran pas 'dul ba stsol bar mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas/ 
41a7(1): skur pa btab pas/ 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng par bgyid pa de / 'di la gzhi des gleng bar bgyid na/ dge 'dun 'dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun
41a8(1): gyi smra bla nor 'dran pas 'dul ba gsol par mdzad/ tshe dang ldan pa phyang bunang la dran pas 'dul ba bstsal bar bzod de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs
41b1(1): shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis kyang bu nor la dran pas 'dul bstsal ba lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// chos ma yin
41b2(1): pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum chos kyi gsum mo// chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong bas pham pa'i ltung ba'i byung de la dge slong rnams gzhi
41b3(1): des gleng bar byed cing de lag ni des gleng bar byed pan/ dge 'dun la dran pas 'dun 'dul ba gsol te/ de la dge 'dun gyis dran pas sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ 
41b4(1): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni snyil bar 'os pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste dge slong dge 'dun lhag me dang ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba de la dge slong rnams gzhi
41b5(1): des gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed na/ dge 'dun gyis dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de dag la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i dran pas/ 
41b6(1): 'dul basbyin pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bshags pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste dge slong bye ma skyes myos sems khrugs tshor bas nyen te sgren mor byung nas/ dge/ 
41b7(1): stong gi tshul ma yin pa'i rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ mang du sbyang smras stsal nas kha chu zags/ mig bgrang bzhin du gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log go/ 
41b8(1): snyam du shes/ pha rol gyis ma skyes par smras so// snyam du shes so// dus gzhan zhig na des na des rang gi sems slar sor chud pa dang / de la gni des dge slong rnams gleng
42a1(1): / par byed cing de la gzhi des gleng bar byed na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni
42a2(1): chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste dge slong ba ni ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba nyid
42a3(1): shes pa las brjed nas phyir dran te/ shes pa las yang brjed pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba ni sbyin pa ni chos ma yin pa'i dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ de ci'i
42a4(1): phyir zhe na/ de ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhugs par 'os pa'i phyir te/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pas dran pas 'dul po sbyin pa gsum yin no// chos kyis dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa
42a5(1): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gyad bu nor la dge slong ma mdza' mos mi bden pas skur ba btab pa de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing / de la gzhi des gleng bar byed pas na
42a6(1): dge 'dun gyis de la blas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni/ chos kyis 'dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong zhig la ltung ba gzhan kho na zhig byung bar gyur pa de la dge slong rnams kyis
42a7(1): gzi gzhan gyis gleng par byed cing / de la gni des gleng par byed pa na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la sgras 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos dran pa su 'du
42a8(1): basbyin pa yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong zhig ltung bar 'gyur la/ des de dge slong gi mdun du bshags 'am/ byin gyis brlangs gyur pa la/ dge slong rnams gni des/ 
42b1(1): / gleng par byed cing / de la ga ni des gleng bar byed na/ dge 'dun las dran pas 'dul ba gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa ni chos kyis dran pas 'dul
42b2(1): basbyin pa yin te/ gsum po yin 'di dag ni chos kyi dran pas 'dul ba sbyin pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar nabs 'dul bar 'os nI/ rtsod pazhi bar byed pa yin ning de ltar na 'din la
42b3(1): gcig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba dang / zhi ba dang nye bar ni ba yin no// dge slong dag ji ltar na ma myos 'dul bar
42b4(1): 'os ni pa rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'diran kha cig gi rtsod pa 'di lta ste/ ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pas rtsod pa pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 
42b5(1): 'di lta ste dge slong bye ma skyes myos sems 'khrugs tshor bas gzhan nas sgron mos byung nas/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/ mang du spyad sras/ brtsal
42b6(1): nas kha chu zags/ mig bgrang bzhin du gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis go snyam du shes/ pha rol gyis ma smras so snyam du shes/ dus gan d+hAn des rang gi sems sor
42b7(1): chung pa dang / de la dge slong rnams gni des gleng bar byed/ de lag ni des gleng bar byed pa na/ dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
42b8(1): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis dge slong bye ma skyes dang / gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa su yang rung ba la/ ma myos pas 'dul
43a1(1): babyin cig/ sbyin pa 'di ltar byaste/ gnas mal bshams la bani brdungs te/ dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bskol/ 
43a2(1): dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing 'thun par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong bye ma skyes kyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ rgan rims rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la
43a3(1): rgan pa'i mthar cog por 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad ces/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong bye ma skyes/ myos sems 'khrug/ 
43a4(1): tshor bar nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/ mang du srud smras/ brtsal nas kha chu zags/ mig bgrang bzhin gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid
43a5(1): kyis log go snyam de 'tshal/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du 'tshal ba la/ dus gzhan zhig na bdag gi sor chud pa dang / bdag la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng
43a6(1): par bgyid cing / bdag la gzhi des gleng par bgyid pa dge 'dun la ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge
43a7(1): slong bye ma skyes lam myos pas 'dul ba bsngal dugasal/ desad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// 
43a8(1): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong bye ma skyes 'di myos sems 'khrugs tshor bas chen nas sgren mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa rjes su 'thun
43b1(1): pa ma lags pa/ mang du spyad smras bstsal nas/ kha rgya zags mig 'gyur/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis lag ga sgyum du 'tshal/ pha rol gyis smras par
43b2(1): smras so// snyam du 'tshal ba las/ dus gzhan zhig na 'dis rang gi sems sor chud pa dang / 'di la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng pa gyid cing / 'di la gni des gleng
43b3(1): bir bgyid pa na/ dge 'dun las ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus / bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / de'i slad du
43b4(1): dge 'dun gyis dge slong bye ma skyes ma myos pas 'dul bstsol par mdzad na// 'di ni gsol ba'i// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong
43b5(1): bye ma skyes 'di myos sems 'khrugs tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/ dge sbyong gi tshul ma lags pa/ rjes su mthun pa ma lags pa/ mang du spyad smras bsngal nas kha chu zag
43b6(1): mig 'gyur ba zhir gyur te/ gnyid kyis ma log par gnyid kyis log gasnyam du 'tshal/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du 'tshal ba las/ dus gzhan nig na 'dis
43b7(1): rang gi sems sor chud pa dang / 'di la dge slong rnams gni des gleng ba bya'o// dge 'dun las ma myos pas 'dul ba gsol te/ de'i slang du dge 'dun gyis dge slong
43b8(1): ma skyes lam myos pas 'dul bstsol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ge srang byem skyes las mamyos pas 'dul bstsol bad par brjod pa de dag ni cang mgasangs
44a1(1): shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge 'du slong bye ma skyes lam// 
44a2(1): myos pas 'dul ba bstsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung de de bzhin du 'dzin to// chos ma yin pa'i ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin par gcig dang / chos kyis gcig
44a3(1): go chos ma yin pa'i gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dge slong ma myos par bdag ni myos so// sems 'khrugs par sems 'khrugs sa snyam du shes pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de lam
44a4(1): myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i ma myos pas 'dul ba sbyin pa yin te/ 'di ni chos ma yin pa'i gcig yin no// chos kyi gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
44a5(1): dge slong bye ma skyes smos sems 'khrugs tshor bas nyen nas sgren mor byung ste/ dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa dang / rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa mang du srung sgras brtsal nas/ kha chu
44a6(1): zags/ mig 'gyur bzhin 'gyur/ de gnyid ma log par gnyid kyis log go snyam du shes/ pha rol gyis ma smras par smras so snyam du shes pa las/ dus gzhan
44a7(1): zhig na des rang gi sems sor chud pa dang / de la dge slong rnams gzhi des gleng bar byed cing / de la gni des gleng bar byed na/ dge 'dun lam myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa
44a8(1): gsol te/ dge 'dun gyis de la ma myos pas 'dul 'drel bar 'os pa sbyin pa ni/ chos kyi ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa sbyin pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyi gcig yin no// dben
44b1(1): dag de ltar nam mos pas 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa ni bar byed pa pa yin ning / de ltar na 'din kha cig rtsod pa rnams 'dul ba dang / ni ba dang nye bar ni bayinano// dge slong ngas
44b2(1): gdam sangapa med pa'i rtsod pa ni par byed pa'i chos 'di gsum gyis 'dul bar byani par byin par ni bar bya ba'i 'di lta ste/ mngon gsum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / dran pas 'dul
44b3(1): bar 'os pa dang / ma mos par 'dul bar 'os pas so// dge slong dag ltung brtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhis 'dul bar bya zhi bar bya ba nye bar ni bar bya'o// bani
44b4(1): gang chem pas byung bar 'os pa dang / mngon gsum du 'dul bar 'os pa dang / gang tshul shing mang po sbyin par 'os dang / rtsa bkram lta bur 'os pas so// dge slong dri ltaran/ 
44b5(1): khas blang bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa ni bar byed pa yin/ ji ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa 'di lta ste/ khas blang bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa ni bar byed pas/ 'dul ba dang ni ba dang / nye ba ni
44b6(1): ba yin nen/ 'di lta ste dge slong dag byung bar gyur pa de la gni des gleng kyang drang ma gleng rung / dran pas byas kyang rung dran pa'i mabyas kyang rung / dge slong dag gi mdun du 'dug nas
44b7(1): 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la ltung ba 'di lta bu zhig byung ba de/ bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa'i mdun du 'grol cing bshags par bgyi
44b8(1): bdag gis 'grol ning bshags na rig par 'gyur gyim bshags nim lags sa// des ltung ba mdzang ma nas brjod par bya'o// des kyang ltung ba mthong de zhes brjod par bya/ 
45a1(1): / snga ma shos kyis phyis sdum par byed byed ma zhes brjod par bya'o// phyi ma bshos kyis bgyid do zhes brjod par bya ste/ 'di ni khas blang ba'o// 
45a2(1): chos ma yin pa khras blang ba sbyin pa bcu dang chos kyi bcu'o// chos yin pa'i khas blang ba sbyin pa bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge slong phas pa'i ltung ba byung ba la bdag la ma
45a3(1): dngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis khas len du bcug pa ni chos ma yin pa khas blang ba'i sbyin yin no// dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / 
45a4(1): nyes byas kyi ltung byung ba la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa dang / dge 'dun gyis de la khas len du 'jug pa ma chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa yin no// 'di lta ste dge
45a5(1): slong phas pham pa'i ltung ba ma byung ba bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes de dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i khas lenA pa sbyin pa yin no// dge 'dun lhag ma dang // 
45a6(1): ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byos kyi ltung ngam byung la bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa ni chos ma yin pa'i
45a7(1): khas len pa sbyin pa ste/ 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa'i khas len pa sbyin pa bcu yin no// chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa bcu gang rje na/ 'di lta ste dge slong pas
45a8(1): dam pa'i ltung ba byung la/ bdag la byung ngosnyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len 'jug pa ni chos kyi khas len pa sbyin yin no/ dge 'dun lhag ma
45b1(1): dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba byung ba la bdag la byung ngo snyam du shes pa de la dge 'dun gyis kha sma 'jug pa ni/ chos
45b2(1): k+Shi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no// 'di lta ste dge slong bas pham pa'i ltung ba ma byung la bdag la ma byung ngasnyam du shes pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis khos len du 'drug nga ni/ 
45b3(1): kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin no// dge 'dun lhag ma da / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas kyi ltung ba ma byung la bdag la ma byung ngo snyam du shes pa
45b4(1): de la/ dge 'dun gyis khas len du 'jug pa'i chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa yin ste// 'di dag ni chos kyi khas len pa sbyin pa bcu yin no// dge slong dag de ltar na khas
45b5(1): blang bar 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa bzhi par byed pa yin zhing / de ltar na 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ khas blang bar 'os pa'i rtsod pa ni bar 'os pas dul ba dang
45b6(1): zhi ba dang nye bar ni ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe dang ldan pa
45b7(1): dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po yangs pa'i spre'u rdzing gi 'grab ma khang khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas nang 'dug go// de la rten nas yangs pa n+dan gyi li tsa byi rnams sangs rgyas
45b8(1): dang / chos dang dge 'dun lhag par bye ba byed pa dang / yangs can gyi dge 'dun rnams kyis bsams pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po 'di gnan nyid du
46a1(1): btsal la gzhan du gyur pa ste/ mnyan yod na skyes pa de la yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams lhags par dang bar byed kyis de la gnas nas
46a2(1): byung ba'i la byas ste/ de nas la yangs pa can gyi li tsi byi rnams ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// snyam du bsams nas de la glags tshol bar gyur to// ji tsam na khyim bdag gnis
46a3(1): gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gasro khang gi khrus la spyan drangs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis gzar dge la chos gos rnams bkal te khrus bya bar bsams

46a5(1): de nyid du chos gos gzhag go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pos khrus byas nis 'di nyid bdag gi chos gos yin no snyam nas dge slong de'i chos gos bgos de
46a6(1): song ngo // ji tsam na dge slong de langs nas rang gi chos gos mi snang nas des dge slong rnams la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo'i gos sus rkus/ ji tsam na phyogs
46a7(1): den tshe dang ldan pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug pa des thos nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mkhan pos phyogs 'dir chos gos bzhag na des nor de khyer
46a8(1): bar gyur grang / re shig kho bo song la mkhan po la dri'o zhes des mkhan po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ mkhan po khyod kyis su zhig gi gos blangs/ des smras pa
46b1(1): bu kho ba'i'o// mkhan po dge sdang chege mo nig chos gos phyogs de nyid du bzhag pa de kha mchis lags sa/ gal te de ltan chos gos de dag khyer de shog shig palta'o// 
46b2(1): des de khyer de 'ongs nas mkhan pos chos gos 'di mkhyen par mdzod decig/ des po shes nas bungs nor khyer de 'ongs kyis dge slong de'i 'di dag yin gyis skyol shig/ des de ltar
46b3(1): dge slong de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chos chos gos 'di mkhan po nor de khyer to// des smras skyes pa des rku sems kyis blangs nas phas pham pa'i ltung ba
46b4(1): byung ngo // de nas grangs tshol ba'i dge slong de rnams kyis de la gleng bam byas par mthus/ gnas pa'i las byas so// tshe drang ljon pa ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu
46b5(1): nig pos de la bsams pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa skye ba ni dka' la/ me dad pa ni skabs gal te 'dug na gdon mi za bar yangs pa can gyi li tse bya/ 
46b6(1): rnams pa ma dad pa skye bar 'gyur gyis 'dor na mnyam yod kho nar 'gro'o snyam nas/ des yangs pa run gyi li ts+yai rnams pa lngas par des lhung bzed dang chos
46b7(1): blangs nas mnyan yod gang na bi der rgyu zhing song ste/ rims kyis rgyu zhing song nas/ mnyan yod du phyin pa dge slong rnams kyis mthong dus smras pa/ tshe dang
46b8(1): ldan pa nag pos 'ongs lags so// 'ongs pa lags sa// khyod mthong ba ni kho bo cag dga' nas 'ongs po ni ma yin no// de ci'i 'di ltar khyod la
47a1(1): brten nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa bI rnams sangs rgyas la mngon par dang / chos la mngon par dad / dge 'dun mngon par dad pas/ sangs rgyas zlos dang / 
47a2(1): dge 'dun la lhag pa par bya ba byed de/ de smras pa/ de ni mang mod kyi yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis bdag la blang ba ma byas dran par ma byas mthug nas dbyung ba'i lus byas sa/ 
47a3(1): zhes pa'i skabs de dge slang rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyed 'dug cing khyod ris chos kyis bskrang
47a4(1): bar bya'o// des nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos slong ngo // yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams bdag cag gi dge slong nag po sbyin med pa gnod pa ma byas pa la mthus gnas
47a5(1): nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa gang yin da ni ma lags pa nig byas sa// zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas/ de rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ mthun yang gangan bA
47a6(1): der rgyu ning song ba las/ de rnams kyis lam kar dge slong zhig mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod gang nas 'ongs pa mnyan yod nas so// khyod kyis ri dgas 'dzin
47a7(1): gyi bu nag po mthong ngam/ mthong ngo des ci bya kho bo cag gis de skyon med pa gnod pa ma byas pa la gleng pa ma byas dran pa ma byas par mthus gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so// 
47a8(1): srang zin no// sus bcom ldan 'das kyis so// de na kha cig gis 'di skad ces smras so// bslangs pa ma yin gyi thag ser bar bslang yin te/ 'di ltar bdag
47b1(1): cag gis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so// bdag cag gi mngon gsum m+b+ha gyur pa de bstung par ni rigs pa ma yin no// kha gcig gis smras pa/ gal te
47b2(1): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rjes bskud na legs pa re baM snang yin no// de rnams rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / chos gos khos
47b3(1): sa phab pa dang / rkang gnyis bkrus te bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs

47b5(1): bdag cag bus pa blun pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa rnams kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu drug po skyon ma mchis pa gnod pa ma bgyid pa la gleng pa ma bgyis pa/ dran par ma bgyis
47b6(1): par mthum gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyis pas bdag cag 'gyod pa skyes nas/ ringagaso 'dzin g+hi branag po la bzod pa gsol 'dir mchis lagaso// bcom ldan/

47b8(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsod pa 'di lta ste/ chos kyis bslang legs so// zhes thos nas de lta lags mod kyi/ bdag cag gi nang na kha cig gi mchid nas 'di skad ces
48a1(1): bslang ba ma yin gyi/ brag bsring bar bsrung ba lags te/ 'di ltar der bdag cag mngon sum du ma gyur to// nas mchi'o// gan

48a3(1): nga'i nyan thos rnams ni 'di lta ste/ ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas rtsod pa skyes shing byung ba zhi bar bya bar 'dod do snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong

48a8(1): dang mang po dang / dge 'du myig pa zhis mngon sum du gleng ba dang / chos ma yin pa'i mngon sum du'i dril ba 'os sbyin pa bcudrug dang / chos kyi bcudrug go// chos ma yin pa'i btsun/

49a1(1): chos dang mi mthun pa gnyis dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pas gang zag chos dang mi mthun pa mang po dang / gang zag chos dang mthun pas dge 'dun chos

49a8(1): 'dul bar 'os pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin zhing / de ltar mi 'dzin kha cig rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os partsod pa ni bar byed pas byi pas dul ba dang /

49b2(1): ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par thos pa ni rtsod pa ni bar byed pas dul ba dang / de zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong me bzhi dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba rjed pa slar dran
49b3(1): te/ shes pa las yang brjed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis

49b5(1): tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo lnga/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur par dang / dge slong mem bani blo gos phrag po cig tu gzar te/ rgan pa'i mthar
49b6(1): cog tsog por 'dug pa la bral mo sbyar te/ de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os par gsol bar byas te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong me ba ni
49b7(1): dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskrad paM slar dran te 'tshal ba las yang bskrad nas dge 'dun la bdag de'i ngo ba nyid tshol du bzhugs par 'os pa gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse//

50a1(1): dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol// dge slong med 'di dge 'dun gyi nang du ltung ba bskyed pa las/ 
50a2(1): bskyed pa las slar dran de/ 'tshal ba dang / bskyed nas dge slong me ba ni 'di dge 'dun la de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os par gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la babacing
50a3(1): bzod pa na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong me ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa stsol bar mdzod do// 'di ni gsol pa'o//
