185b7(1): ldan 'dra lcid rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsdig gyi nags chang rnying na banags// don mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshang pa 'dun 'a shA pas mtshan ma la bab ban btsa ldan 'ad gang na bded bang ma
185b8(1): bzhin 'a kyis gaN+Dalag pa phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po bzhi pa de dge nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas me'i phung ba chen po lnga bdag ma gyi gcig tu byung nas sreg par byed
186a1(1): de zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba la bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug / 
186a2(1): ldeng rgyas 'dasang ral pa cad de nyid kyi mtshan ma rgya sar rnams la bal ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan mo'i phung po chen pa 'bar rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba
186a3(1): nas bsreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyong de 'di ltar de'i mdun
186a4(1): ru me'i phung po zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa'i bar zhig yong ngo snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gan
186a5(1): ba der song se byin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol 'dir bdag ma dang gsum rgyu skar rnams la blta bar
186a6(1): dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na/ zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar ba zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sam
186a7(1): te dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyong ba de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'a bar kun tu rab tu' bar te me lce cig tu gyur na sreg par byed pa zhig mchis
186a8(1): sam ma 'ang srung cing me la yongs su spyod dam/ dme la yongs su mi spyod de de lha mod kyi 'dir ma dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo
186b1(1): la bab pa nang grang na ba der 'ongs te byin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phrag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar ba bzhi po de dag nas snga ma bzhin du
186b2(1): me'i phung po chen po lnga po de 'bar nas me lce cig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la
186b3(1): ches bzang blta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po gang
186b4(1): ta ma ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung
186b5(1): ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas ra mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la
186b6(1): bab pa/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te gal te ma ga d+hASh+Ti rnams kyis/ dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di
186b7(1): ltar mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la de lha ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod kyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig nas
186b8(1): gzhan du sang yang ci ma rung sam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun
187a1(1): gzhan du bzhud do// de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang bkur bsti chen po byung nas bza' ba
187a2(1): dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na/ mchod
187a3(1): sbyin de zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur bsti chen po byung zhing bzang ba dang bcas pa rab tu med
187a4(1): po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye ma nga ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung ba dag gis de yang de la longs spyod du gzhug go
187a5(1): snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis lteng khyod srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gang na ba der gshes
187a6(1): so// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das tshong ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
187a7(1): dge sbyong byon tam 'od srung ral 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyad ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du bzhud lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi 'dug nas dam/ 
187a8(1): chos sbyin zhag bdun du byed la bab nas/ 'di snyam du gal te me ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge slong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba yin par
187b1(1): shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'dra yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan
187b2(1): du song bang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyis sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo // 'o na ci'i slar
187b3(1): 'dir byon lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin nag bdun so du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur bsti chen po byung zhing bza' ba
187b4(1): dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis// kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de
187b5(1): la yongs su longs spyong du gzhug gi snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar lags so// nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas da
187b6(1): 'ongs pa yin no// dge sbyong chen po ci bder kho na long skyod gsol/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po
187b7(1): rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che med kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ldeng rgyas na ltung rgyas
187b8(1): 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshar tshing na bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
188a1(1): to// dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nyen du bzhugs shig dang / bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ra/ 
188a2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rang kha
188a3(1): nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gdugs 'tshed lags shing
188a4(1): mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// 'od srung de'i phyir song shig nga'ang 'ong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas
188a5(1): 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling du
188a6(1): gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas
188a7(1): gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas
188a8(1): 'od srang ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo
188b1(1): mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir nas
188b2(1): 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gang gas
188b3(1): pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de ltang bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis
188b4(1): gal te longs spyod cig/ dge sbyong chen po ba de kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong
188b5(1): chen pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mnamache med kyi/ bdag kyang dag bcom pa yin no snyam mo// lajam bu'i sem ji lta bar sbya ru ra'i snye ma rnam
188b6(1): kyang de bzhin no// brang gi sgra mi stan du gshegs nas ma mos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lhung rgyus 'ad srung
188b7(1): ral pa car gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byor nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
188b8(1): bcan 'das nas 'ad rgyas pa grang ral bcan gyis bcom ldan 'das bsi gnas kyi gdan bshams dashing la bzhugs pa mthong ba/ mamangs
189a1(1): kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyed kyi lhung bzed na
189a2(1): ci mchis/ 'di ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas/ 
189a3(1): ma rmos ma btab pa'i sA l+ya'i lhung bzed bkang nas/ 'dir byin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig che po ci
189a4(1): bde kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ye me chen
189a5(1): che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de bzhin du rgyal po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su gshegs nas/ lce'i bdud rtsis
189a6(1): lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs
189a7(1): / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang nyid kyis g.yas byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na der song ste phyin
189a8(1): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong chen po gdugs tshod legs nas mchis na dge sbyong chen po de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ 
189b1(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham thabs bsdams/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na
189b2(1): bshams pa der gshegs te byon nas bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhug
189b3(1): bar rig nas/ btsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba lhung bzed bka' nas phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
189b4(1): can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad // de nas bcom ldan 'das chus chu ba'i dgos pa
189b5(1): zhig byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
189b6(1): song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lags pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod ma chen po zhes byang ste/ chu ba ba de la bcom ldan
189b7(1): 'das kyis chus chu ba'i bya ba mdzad do// lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu 'bab pa mthong ngo / 
189b8(1): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te mu 'di ni sngon ni meng na chu'i 'di da ltar gang nas ba bsnyam mo// de nas ldeng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can/ bcom ldan
190a1(1): na nag ga na pa mas yangs par na mams sa nan ma mtsham na
190a2(1): 'di gnas pa bskal bgyi dang // 'ang srung 'dir khrid las ngas bapas mams bzhes nas/ grags 'dir bcugs kenal phas kyi bya ba ma rang ba nang la chus tshu
190a3(1): dgas bzhig byung // de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang brgya byin gyis ngal chus chu'i dgas pa byung bar shes nas phyogs 'dir lag pas la bstan pa las/ 
190a4(1): de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad de 'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya ba'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di
190a5(1): snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge slong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
190a6(1): lteng rgyas na lter rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyed bred nang du yang dag 'jogs
190a7(1): las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas bgos pa gang na bder gshegs te byon nas/ dzi lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi gamatha' gcig tu na bam 'chos
190b1(1): gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par bzhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na/ shing ardzu na gang
190b2(1): na ba der logs su phyag rkyang ngo // de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dung bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas
190b3(1): byung ngo // lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa zhig mthong ngo // 
190b4(1): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ adz+nyA na'i yal ga'i 'di sngon ni 'dung bar ma gyur na/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di su zhig gis 'dud snyam ma/ 
190b5(1): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rol pa can/ 'di bcom ldan 'das gang na der sang ste phrin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong
190b6(1): chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na/ ardza nA'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa mthong
190b7(1): / mthong nas kyang bdag 'di sam du sems te yadz+ra me lal gnon pa 'di sngan ni 'dung par mgyur na/ da 'ad su shig gis 'dud snya ma bgyid // 
190b8(1): 'ad sung nga 'dir byang zed nang du yang dag 'dzag las bcings nas/ rdzing lag nges banas pa gang na darang gshegs te byan nas/ dzaM lag pas thams pa
191a1(1): pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' cig tu bza' chos gos rnams bzhag te/ rdzing lag pas brkos par bzhugs te lus khrus byas
191a2(1): nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas shing ardzun gang na ba der logs su lag pa brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di 'dud par
191a3(1): gyur te de lang 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // 'od srung 'di ni shing ardzun lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
191a4(1): can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// 
191a5(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha
191a6(1): na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang tu bkra snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi
191a7(1): dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang nab
191a8(1): der sang sa phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal ka/ bcom ldan 'dus phyag dar khrod pa'i shana'i ras dag 'di la bkra bar gsal/ 
191b1(1): de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i shan
191b2(1): ras rnams gang du bkram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag cig
191b3(1): las rdo le ba che la ring zhig khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
191b4(1): 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa sha na'i ras dag bkram mo// lteng rgyas 'od
191b5(1): srung ba ste gnas na 'chags pa na/ rdo le ba che la ring ba dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'od dag sngon ni
191b6(1): med na rdo le ba che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs so snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
191b7(1): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdol ba che la
191b8(1): ring ba dgacig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag ni sngon ma mchis na rdole ba che la ring ba 'di dag ngas
192a1(1): ni gags pal te/ mchis rnam gyid nga / 'od srung 'di rangs phyag dar khrod pa'i shan 'i ras dag brnyes so// de nasang bdi snyam du dgongs te/ 
192a2(1): phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas/ brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs/ 
192a3(1): te phyin nas/ ngal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i shan 'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams
192a4(1): bkrus so// nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du bkram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis da'i dgongs pa shes nas
192a5(1): zag cig las rdo leb che zhing ring ba gzhan zhig blangs te/ nga gang na bder 'ongs te/ phyin nasang la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phrag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras
192a6(1): rnams bkram du gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo// 'od srung rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung
192a7(1): ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sung ches po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
192a8(1): lteng rgyas ma steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing rabazhugs so// de'i tshe ner ny+dzani'i chu cher 'brug na 'bab po/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas
192b1(1): lhag pas khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis g.yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag par mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa/ 
192b2(1): chu chen po 'brug pas khyer bar mgyur grang / mal bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal lo// snyam du bsams ras/ shing gcig pa'i gru rang du zhugs te/ 
192b3(1): bcom ldan 'das btsal ban/ sbed rgyas 'od srung ras can gyis bcom ldan 'das sa 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong chen po gson nam/ bod srung gson no// 
192b4(1): dge sbyong chen po bzhugs shing gcig pa'i glur 'jug gam/ 'od srung 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma langs ji ltar thugs
192b5(1): mnyam par gzhag na shing gcig pa'i grwa ji lta bur tshul 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul la mngon par 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par
192b6(1): gzhag na/ shing gcig pa'i grwa ji ltar bar tshul 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mjed do// de nas lteng
192b7(1): rgyas 'od srung ral chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yogs pa'i blas pa med pan chag pas 'chag
193a1(1): sa pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang
193a2(1): dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
193a3(1): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ 
193a4(1): dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis/ 
193a5(1): bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam tu rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
193a6(1): ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bster ba rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spang bar bgyi'o// 
193a7(1): 'od srung khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam dge sbyong chen po ma ltas lags so// 'od srung de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shig/ bshes gnyen can
193a8(1): rnams kyis ni 'khor la bltas pa legs pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bste gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
193a9(1): tsha 'di nar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ 
193b1(1): bram ze'i'u khye'u rnams la sbas pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar/ tshangs par
193b2(1): spyod pa spyad na/ shes drug ci byed mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni/ mkhan pa la brten nas/ lags pas gal te
193b3(1): mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar/ tshangs par sbyang ba spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u
193b4(1): ngag khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung nai rany+dza na'i nang du 'or cig/ mkhan po bka'
193b5(1): bzhin 'tshal zhes/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs zar rnams chu klung nai rany+dza na'i nang
193b6(1): du bor nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po 'di ltar bdag
193b7(1): cag gi bgyi ba gang lags pa bgyid lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
193b8(1): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong che chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas te bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'di skang
194a1(1): rab tu byung ba dang / bsrer pa rdzogs pa dag slong gi dngas ba rtsub pa ba ldan bdag dge sbyong chen pa'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyong pa snang
194a2(1): par gyi'o// 'od srung tshur cig tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de'i tshe lter rgyas
194a3(1): 'od srung ral pa can gyi spun tshwa klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung gnyis 'khor gnyis brgya lnga bcu dang chu klung nai rany+dza na'i mjug gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do// 
194a4(1): chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung srur g.yang gzhi dang shing shur dang 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs dang blugs gzar de dag chu klung r-i rak+Sha n+das khyer ba mthong ngo // mthong nas
194a5(1): kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po 'am rgyan po 'am me 'am chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / 
194a6(1): ma la bdag cag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo// snyam mo// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung srun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
194a7(1): 'chol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'ong srung ral pa can swa byi snum sbar bgos nas/ 
194a8(1): 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod// chu klung 'ang srung dang ga la'ang srung sun gyis/ lteng rgyas 'di srung ral pa tsams
194b1(1): bsnam sbyar bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di
194b2(1): skad ces smras so// 'od srung 'di mchog yin la/ de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung dag 'di ni mchog yin te/ de ni ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang ga
194b3(1): ya 'od srung srur dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi
194b4(1): phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas khogs gdugs pa ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur bsti byas bla mar byas ri mor
194b5(1): byas/ mchod par byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang / lag gnyis kyi bar du yang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyis// 
194b6(1): ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod par spyad par bya'o// snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
194b7(1): dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs so par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tho ba lA na
194b8(1): ma gyi sa kyang chen pa'i sku bar zangs par grang bzung bar bgyi'o// khyod kyis 'khar la b.las sam/ dag kyang ngachen pa ma b.las lagasas/ 
195a1(1): 'ang srang dag pa'i phyir ri shig 'kho la ba mas shig/ 'di ltar khyer la bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa bshes gnyen can dag gis ni 'al
195a2(1): la blta ba legs pa yin na// de nas cha kyang 'ang srung dang ga la 'od srung su rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der sang gi phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces
195a3(1): sras so// bram ze'u khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ kha ba cag ni dge slong cher ba'i spyar sngar tshangs par srung ba snang ma/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag
195a4(1): bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan pa dag la brten nas lags kyis// gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par snang ba spyod pa na/ 
195a5(1): bdag cag kyang mekhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas chu klung 'od srung dang ga pa
195a6(1): 'od srung sun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcwa lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad skad ces gsol to// 
195a7(1): dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / 
195a8(1): bskor bar rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thab par lhan bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i slar sngar tshangs par spong ba spang bar bgyi'o// 'od srung ngag tshur shog
195b1(1): tshangs par spyad par spyod cig de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang des bsten par rdzogs pa dang / dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de nas bcom
195b2(1): ldan 'das kyis ral pa can steng po de rab tu byung bsten par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga ya gang na ba der
195b3(1): rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ga ya ga yar byon nas ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge
195b4(1): slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la/ cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/ 
195b5(1): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di
195b6(1): yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang
195b7(1): la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam pa rnam pa bzhis mdzad de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang bzhugs pa dang / mnal par mdzad de/ 
195b8(1): me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de// mo'i ting nge 'dzin la skams par zhugs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi su 'od zer rnams bsdu
196a1(1): tshogs dga'abyin pa yang dang // 'di las na po dang / bang po dang / dmar pa dang dkar ba dang / le brgan dang / she
196a2(1): kha ga dag go// tshe 'phral phung du yang ston par mdzad nga/ rtswa'i slang nas me 'bar bar mdzadal/ sru'i sad las ma grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do// mu'i
196a3(1): sod nam 'bar bar mdzad la/ sru'i srang nas ma grang ma'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba
196a4(1): bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par du mdzad
196a5(1): pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dgung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin
196a6(1): mo// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o// khyed kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o// rnam par
196a7(1): shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o// 'di ni rtog shig 'di ni ma rtogs shig/ 'di ni yid la byos shig/ 'di ni yid la ma byed cig/ 'di ni spongs shig/ 'di ni ma

196b1(1): ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin
196b2(1): zhe na/ dge slong dag mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing mig gi reg pa'i rkyen gyis
196b3(1): nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// 
196b4(1): dge slong dag rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / yid kyi 'dus te
196b5(1): reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu
196b6(1): 'bar ba yin no// gang gis kun tu 'bar zhe na 'dod chags kyi me dang zhe sdang gi me dang gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar/ skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan
196b7(1): dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o// je la 'di ni
196b8(1): de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dag
197a1(1): slong de len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par 'grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga ya na ga ya'i mgo ba
197a2(1): mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba
197a3(1): rang gi don rjes su thob pa srid pa kun du sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha sngags dang thabs cig tu
197a4(1): bzhugs so// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tshe ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba dang / shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing
197a5(1): rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te khyim par gyur
197a6(1): te/ khyim na gnas ra ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur te/ 
197a7(1): de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang /  rin po che dang / bud med rnying
197a8(1): tshe dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yin mo// de la bu song yang chang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpa' brtul bang pa/ ya lag
197b1(1): chog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa/ de rgya mtsho la thugs pa'i sa chen po ma lus par bsngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med la 'di nyid chad pa med
197b2(1): cing mtshan gyis 'da' ba med la/ chos dang ldan mthur zhing snyoms par legs par pha ba ste gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te skra dang kha su bregs te gos ngur smrig
197b3(1): bags nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
197b4(1): 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so// thos ras kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song
197b5(1): ste phyin nas/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul rgyu
197b6(1): ban shAkya rnams kyi gnon nu gangs ri'i ngos chub skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srang ser skya'i bsti gnas dang btsang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan
197b7(1): mkhan dang bltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur par gyur te khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
197b8(1): ba nas/ bdun pa blon parin po cher 'gyur ra zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la ba song yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthum zhing sems
198a1(1): bar legs par pha ba ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur sdig
198a2(1): bgos zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstar pa zhig zos so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// lha de khums shig
198a3(1): lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o// grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bas
198a4(1): gnas dang ha cang mI ring ba zhig tu byang ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te khyim par 'gyur te/ gal te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhes
198a5(1): bya ba nas chos dang mi thur zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste/ gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gal te sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur
198a6(1): smig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
198a7(1): rgyas 'jig ten du sa rnam par grags par 'gyur bar de lta khams shig/ lnga bas gtso bas ches gtse bar 'gyur du mchi'o// zhes khyed cag de sang ma sna shig
198a8(1): de ci'i phyir zhem/ grong ba dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhan nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste gal te 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal bar gyur na/ 
198b1(1): de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dang bas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/

198b3(1): ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bso srungs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhin 'dug nas/ slor pa'i gzhi lnga smor par byed pa/ kye ma bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi
198b4(1): ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i
198b5(1): kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang nye bar song ba
198b6(1): dang / des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos brlabs pa de shes nas bslab pa bcas shing
198b7(1): srab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ni ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma gad+hA'i rgyal
198b8(1): pa lab byangs gzugs can meng pa de thagangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ dran pa la glen par zang // kye ma'i bdag gi yul du 'jig tan gyi gar ba po
199a1(1): gshegs pa dgra bal pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang thabs su ldan pa bde par gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen
199a2(1): bskus bu 'dul ba'i khal skur ba bla yad pa lu dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag ce
199a3(1): 'gro ba dang /  bar song ban des kyang bdag la rnas bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa shes pa dang / bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas
199a4(1): shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag cig ljongs rgyu
199a5(1): ba ru shAkya rnams kyi gzhar nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang bcang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba yin ya ba de zam ze
199a6(1): mtshan mkhan dang bltas mkhan zhes bya ba ras 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de skra dang kha
199a7(1): spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos ras dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
199a8(1): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de g.ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa car du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa
199b1(1): zad pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bar ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid pa kun tu sbyar ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems
199b2(1): shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// zhes zos so// thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang ma
199b3(1): der dong ste lhags nas/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'di na
199b4(1): lha'i yul na rgyu ba la/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa bde zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyu ro zhe bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sa de sku
199b5(1): rang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
199b6(1): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ras/ de ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom
199b7(1): par zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ 
199b8(1): lha de la bkur si mdzod cig dang / de ltan lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro// de nas ma gang+gA'i rgyal po gzo spangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig
200a1(1): la bas pa/ kwa' nang rje char khyad bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song nas song nas kho ba'i 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis
200a2(1): la mag bos phyag byos la gnod pa chang ngamanyam nganyung ngam 'tsho'am bskyed pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba dang sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyong ngam/ zhes zhus
200a3(1): la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang gzims
200a4(1): cha dang skar skad kyi rkyer slar dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol TI ga/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal
200a5(1): zhes mi des/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bas gnyis
200a6(1): la mgo bos phrag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mi nges 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
200a7(1): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos ma ga dA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chang ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ zhes bya ba nas reg
200a8(1): par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du/ bstan gsal lags sa// kye me khyod dang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo srungs gzugs can sring ba bde bar gyur cig
200b1(1): btsun pa ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas/ 'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun thabs cig la/ ji srid 'tsho'i ba
200b2(1): dun bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang bsnyun spyad kyi rkyer sran dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid ma/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu
200b3(1): gshegs su gsol zhes mchi legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsang bas gnang ngo // de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsang bas gar
200b4(1): bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams
200b5(1): cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol
200b6(1): ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu/ ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ljang zang gi tshal
200b7(1): na yod pa gang bA der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ldang
200b8(1): zang gi tshal na bzhugs so// ma ga tA'i rgyal po bza sungs gzugs can sring pos/ bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge spang sa / 
201a1(1): gi dag gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
201a2(1): pa ra ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal na yod ba gang na ba der gshegs te/ ma ga d+hA'i pa rnams kyi mchod rter legs par rab
201a3(1): gnas ljang brang gi tshal na yod pa na bzhugs so// thos kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas/ bcom ldan
201a4(1): 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/ de'i shing rta'i 'khor lo sa'i nang 'bying bar gyur to// nges bsams pa bdag gi
201a5(1): las skyod car cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam mo// lha rnams kyis de la sbas pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las sbyar can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las
201a6(1): mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag btson ra na 'dug gis de dag thoran cig/ rgyal bros smras pa gal te de lta na 'don no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du bcug go/ 
201a7(1): babargyal ba por byung bar brtsams pa nang brgyan sAl zag ga/ des yang bsams pa/ bdag gis ni gdan mi za bar las sbyin pan zhig byas te/ des na bdag la
201a8(1): lhas ngan pa gsan spe la dbu rgyar thug pa'idabyung nga snyam mo// yang lu rnams kyis yang sbas pa/ rgyal ba cher po khyod kyis las stso canam byas pod kyi khyod kyi ngang
201b1(1): lhan cig mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kha cig ni 'dus/ kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ge mo zhes bya ba dag ra las kyi mtha' byed cing
201b2(1): 'dug pa de dag sman cig/ rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bkug go// de nas po gzugs can sring po shing rta khri nyis spang dang zhab 'bring
201b3(1): ba rta pa'i tshogs khri brgya stong dang / ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i kha ba nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang
201b4(1): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo // de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste bzhon pa las ba bas rkang pa kho nas kun
201b5(1): dga' ra bar zhugs so// ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag ji tsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das mngon pa'i bar de nas/ rgyal po'i mtshan
201b6(1): ma lnga po ze'u ka dang gdugs dang ral gri dang nor bu'i rnga ya ba dang / lham khra bo rnams phung ngo // 'dul ba ga ni/ dum bu bzhi pa/ bam po brgyad
201b7(1): cu dgu pa/ de ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po'i bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der sang
201b8(1): su phyin pa dang / bla gos zag pa gcig tu gapar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal ma sbyar ba bdud de rang gi ming nas byung skye lan gsum gsol pa/ 
202a1(1): btsun pa bdaga'i ma gang+gA'i rgyal ba bgasungs gzugs can sang pa legs sa// btsun pa bdag ni ma gang+gA'i rgyal ba tham spangs
202a2(1): gzugs can snying po lags so// rgyal po lags so rgyal po de bzhin te de de bzhin no// rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying
202a3(1): be yin no// rgyal po yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi stan ci lta ba la 'dug shig/ de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan
202a4(1): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bas
202a5(1): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon tu yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar
202a6(1): 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das gang khwa der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'khod do// 
202a7(1): kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing
202a8(1): 'dug par gyur to// de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khrim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge slong cheran po ljang rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spang ba
202b1(1): la skyong dam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spyod snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i bram ze
202b2(1): dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri basbas pa/ lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir
202b3(1): ci mthong ra/ 6me sangs nas na brtul zhugs 'di dag spyod// khyod kyis ji ltar mo'i mchod spangs pas// don de 'od srung ngal smra bar gyis// lteng rgyas 'od srung
202b4(1): gis gsol pa// 'di ni kha cig zas skom de bzhin no// 'dod pa dag dang bud med kho na smra/ de dag thabs kyi dri mar ba mthong ste// nges bdag mchod sbyin
202b5(1): mi dga' bsregs blugs min// khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang // de bzhin ro la yid ni mi dga' na/ lha min 'jig rten la ci khyod kyi yid// 
202b6(1): dga' ba yin nam 'od srung dri yis smos// phung po ma mchis zhi ba ci ma mchis// 'dod sring ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis// gzhan gyis mi bkri ga
202b7(1): 'phang mchog mthong ste// des bdag mtshang sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs min// mgo 'phang mi nyams mchog ni mthong bas// mchod sbyin rtul zhugs dang ni zhug
202b8(1): dag gis// 'amasnyam bdag gi yid ni mongs gyur te/ dmas lang gyur nas skye 'i rjes bzhin mthom// grub pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad pa/ 
202'a1(1): go 'phang 'dus ma byas de bzeng mthong na// thub pa go'u tam rnam par 'dren khyod ni// skye bo phal cher don brtson bde la zhug/

202'a4(1): ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na rang gi stan gyi nang na mi snang gyur cing // shar phyogs kyi seng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi
202'a5(1): byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang // nyal ba byed de// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/

202'a7(1): ser ba dang dmar pa dang dkar po dang / le brgan dang shel gyi kha dog go// tsha 'phrul brang du yang ston par byed de lus kyis spang nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi song
202'a8(1): nas grang ma'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa/ lus kyi sang nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi mang nas rgya grang ma'i rgyan 'bebs par byed pa del bu'i ting nga 'dzim
202'b1(1): snyoms par zhugaso// shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang nub dang brang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi
202'b2(1): bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
202'b3(1): gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni

202'b5(1): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'od srung da ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srung du ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod nga'i nyan
202'b6(1): zos yin no// 'od srung khyod rang gi sar ji lta ba la 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mag
202'b7(1): bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po ni lteng rgyas 'od
202'b8(1): srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spong ba la mi spyod kyi/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nyid dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spong ngo snyam mo// de nas bcom
203a1(1): ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs car snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po cher po gzugs la skye yang
203a2(1): yod/ 'jig pa yang yod/ de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po tshar ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la skye ba
203a3(1): dang 'jig rte pa yang yod// de'i skye ba dang 'jig par yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig

203a6(1): khas mi len mi 'dzir// lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zher bar mi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam
203a7(1): par shes pa dang yongs su shes na bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/ mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs

203b7(1): so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis mag
203b8(1): tA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag sam bdag ces bya ba'i ni byas
204a1(1): baman su thams pa dang mi lda pas brtags pa'i rjes su lung ba yin// 'di la sa bdag ce'am bdag gi mang kyi/ dge slong dag skye
204a2(1): na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing 'gag par yang sdug bsngal 'gag go/ skye ba na yang 'du byed rnams skye zhing 'gag pa na 'du byed rnams 'gag par gyur te/ rgyud dang rkyen de la
204a3(1): brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'ang byed kyi rgyud 'jug go// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi rgyud nyid mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chung nas sems can gyi
204a4(1): 'chi 'bo dang skye ba 'dogs par mdzad do// dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi pho dang skye ba dang kha dog bzang
204a5(1): po dang kha dog ngan pa dang dman pa dang / gya nom pa dang bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang gzigs so// las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams
204a6(1): yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyong ba dang ldan/ 'phags pa rnams
204a7(1): la bskur ba 'debs pa dang log par lta ba yin te/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song
204a8(1): ngam 'gro lag par lung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams ma skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spang ba dang ldan dag dang ying gyi

204b7(1): na zhes ma gsung ngo // de la chos kyi btags pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di la ste 'di yod pas 'di yod// 'di skyes pas 'di skye ste// 'di lta ste ma rig
204b8(1): pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i rgyar gyis ga thugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi chen gyis skye mcher drug/ skye mcher drug gi rkyen
205a1(1): gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba// tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa sreng pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis sring ba/

205a7(1): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// 
205a8(1): dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// mya ngan 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug
205b1(1): bsngal 'gag pa ste/ rgyur bcad pas mi byung zhing nying mtshams sbyar ba med par 'gags pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal yin no// dge slong dag de la yongs su
205b2(1): mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar ni bar// de ni gsil bar gyur pa/ de ni nub pa ste/ 
205b3(1): dge slong dag zhi ba'i gnas ni 'di min te/ 'di lta ste phung po thams cad spangs pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gags pa/ mya ngan las

206a3(1): lags so// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am phyi 'am/

206a6(1): chen pa de la bas ma khrad kyis char ba dang 'dugs dang 'du byed ga ma ring ba dang rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa sa ma 'ongs pa 'am/ dal byung ba
206a7(1): / rang gi 'am kyil sa/ rags pa'am za ba 'am/ ngan pa'am/ rgya'am pa'am/ gang dag pa gan bas rlungs/ de dag rnams ca la dzin
206a8(1): gal ma/ yang sa rje ma mnan/ 'din bdag gi bdagam man gas bar du dag pa'i gas ma kyis pa la bzhin du das pa la
