411a2(1): bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam su byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin du 'gro ste/ gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa las lung ston par bzhed na ni/ 
411a3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam log su nub par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhin na ni/ 'dun logs su nub par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal bar lung
411a4(1): ston par bzhed na ni/ zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur// dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed man ni rting par nub par 'gyur/ yi dgas su skye bar
411a5(1): lung ston par bzhed pa ni zhabs kyi 'the bor nub par 'gyur/ mi skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ pus mor nub par 'gyur/ stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur
411a6(1): ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/ phyag
411a7(1): mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur// lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ lte bar nub par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na
411a8(1): ni zhal du nub par 'gyur// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spungar nub par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
411b1(1): byang chub cu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur// de nas 'od gzer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bstod pa byas te btsum
411b2(1): ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur nub po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa/ kha dog sngo tshogs stong gos bkra ba'i
411b3(1): tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur pa// ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin// de yis phyog rnams kun du snang bar bgyis// yang tshigs su
411b4(1): bcad de gsol pa/ rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi// sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa// rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par
411b5(1): rtsal gdung ltar dkar 'dzu ston mi mdzad// de bslang brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas// rgyal ba'i dbang po sgrub pa skyes kyi mchog/ nyam par
411b6(1): 'tshal ba nyin par po rnams kyi// the tsom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang // dam pa bzang po dag gis gsal tu gsol// sarba ri dbang lta bu
411b7(1): brtan pa'i mchog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum ma ston// brtan pa ji ltar 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa// skye bo pha la chen 'di dag de
411b8(1): nyan 'tshal// kun dga' bo khyod kyis gang mkhan nga la sems mngon par dang par byas nas rdzi rnga chen po brdung bar byed pa de mthong ngam/ btsun pa de
412a1(1): mthong legs so// kun dga' bo gar mkhan de sems bskyed pa des nga sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sbyin pa'i
412a2(1): chos ni 'di yin te/ ngal sems dang par byed pa gang yin pa'o// lnga sbyin gyis ma skyes ya dgra smras pa/ kho bos khyad rgyal srid la bzhag pa yin gyis/ 
412a3(1): khyod kyis kyang kho bo'i sangs rgyas nyid du sko shig/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sku gser gyi kha dog du 'dug na/ re shig dang por gser gyi kha
412a4(1): dog med do// des smras pa kho bos kyang gser gyi kha dog tu snang bar 'gyur zhes des gser bkus nas smras pa/ kho bo'i lus gser gyis g.yogs shig/ 
412a5(1): des smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te tshor ba gnags phod na'o// des smras pa/ khyod kyis g.yogs shig pa dang bong bar bya'o// des tsan+da tsu zhes bya ba
412a6(1): 'bru mar gyis lus byugs nas/ gsar gyi gyim bag gis lus g.yogs pa dang / de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yin du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams
412a7(1): su myong dge slong rnams kyis ko ka la~M kab dz+nyA sa pa/ sbyin padAn/ des smras pa/ phyogs cig mo zhig na/ gser gyi kha tog tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ 
412a8(1): snod rnams phyogs der sod pa dang de rnams kyis de sbrulag bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen te kuco 'don pa thos nas/ de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo // 
412b1(1): dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus btsun pa lnga sbyin gas mar gyi kha dog don du gnyer
412b2(1): bas sdug bsngal mi zad pa tsha ba rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
412b3(1): dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na yang / gsor gyi zhwa don tu gnyer ba'i phyir tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal ba
412b4(1): gyur pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba grong khyer wA ra NA sI na/ khyolam ring por sod sod pa'i bud med cig yod pa de'i mdun du bya rog cig skad
412b5(1): sgyu ma bstan par 'byin nas/ des smras pa/ bya rog song shig seng shig gal te bdag gi khyim dab bde bar 'khor na khyod la gsar gyi zhwa zhig sbyin no// 
412b6(1): ji tsam na de'i khyim tho ba de yang bde bar spyad 'od so sa/ bla rog de gser gyi zhwa'i rgyud du de'i mdun du 'dug nas skad spyan mar 'byung ba dang / de nas des
412b7(1): la gser gyi zhwa zhig byin no// des de gyon nas phan tshun du ldang ba na/ de gser gyi zhwa'i phyir/ bya khres mgo bcod do// lngas tshigs su bcad de
412b8(1): smras pa/ don med gzhi dang ldan pa yi// nor ni phung bar 'gyur ba de// gang gi mgo la gser yod pa'i/ bya rog gis ni phung byed btsal/ 
413a1(1): rgya/ pa de la/ glang mtshan dang ldan pa zhig yod nas/ des de dge sbyong dang bram ze dang rang gi skye bo dang / phongs pa dang / 
413a2(1): mgon med pa dang / bkren pa dang / nad pa rnams la zan byin nas ci re dgar spyod du btang ngo // des dus gzhan zhig na phan tshan rgyu rgyu ba las 'dam du song nas khyim
413a3(1): bdag gis nyi ma nub tsam na thos de btsal ba las/ de'i drung du phyin nas/ des bsams pa/ da ni dbyung mi nus kyis sang nang par dbyung bar bya'o snyam mo// 
413a4(1): glang gis smras pa/ bdag gi mdun du zhag pa zhig zhog la bzhad cig dang / gal de wa 'ongs par gyur dang / bdag gi ras zhags pa blangs de/ de la gdab
413a5(1): bar bgyi'o// des de'i mdun du zhugs pa zhig bzhag nas song ba dang / mtshan mo ji tsam na we zhig 'ongs nas des smras pa/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / pad+ma dkar po
413a6(1): dag 'byin pa 'di su zhig/ glang gis smras pa/ kho bo yin te 'dam gyi nang du bying nas 'dug go// zhes bsams pa/ bdag zis dang phrad do snyam nas/ des de
413a7(1): la 'tshe bar brtsams pa dang / glang gis smras pa/ khyod phyogs 'di nas mdza shig/ tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ 'on kyang de ldog du ma btub nas de la
413a8(1): na bzhin du 'tshe ba dang / glang gi tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo pad+ma'i rtsam 'byin// kha bo pad+mad kyi so 'dra min// gal de khyod ni za 'dod na// rgyab tu song la
413b1(1): bza' bar gyis// was bza'o snyam ras rgyab du zhom pa dang / khyu mchog gi ras zhags pa bdab pas wa'i skyes nas thogs nas nam mkha' la 'phyang ba dang / glang gi
413b2(1): rigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod rtse gar mkhar rdzab ke ba 'am// / 'od de gar slob pa khye'u 'am// dgon par bya dga' ster ba med// bzo ni grong khyer bstan
413b3(1): par gyis// was kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdag ni gar mkhan rdzabagye ba'am// gar srab khye'u ni ma yin de// brgya byin gyis ni sgras btsugs
413b4(1): pas// bdag ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bgrod// klung gis yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa// brgya byin gyis ni sras ma btsugs pa// tshangs pa'i 'jig
413b5(1): rden smos cis dgos// thabs kyi zhabs pas khyod thogs pas// khyod ni 'tshe bar ma mthong ngo // dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de di'i dus kyi khyu mchog
413b6(1): gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis nga'i tshig tshig tu ma byas pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// da ltar yang 'dis nga'i tshig tshig du ma byas pa
413b7(1): sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha sbyin gyis bco ldan 'as
413b8(1): bka' mnyan pa la mnar ma mchis pa gzhol bar gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig du ma
414a1(1): gangs nan la glang po che zhig yod pa zhing rjes kyi steng tu rkad pa 'jog na/ sdong dum khri'u ka ni gi sted du rdeg chos par 'gyur to// 
414a2(1): lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mdor ni glang chen rkang rjes dang // blun po khyod rjes mi 'dra yis// don med blo 'di spongs byos shig/ ngal la
414a3(1): thob par gyur ta re// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di rkang rjes kyi phyi
414a4(1): tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal bar gyur to// da ltar yang 'di rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i chags don du gnyer ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tshe brtub
414a5(1): pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i che ba nyams su myong bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro gnod sbyin kum bi ra'i gnas
414a6(1): na bzhugs so// lha spyan gyis yang ma skyes dgrol spras pa kho bos khyod ni rgyal srid la bzhag na/ khyod kyis kho bo sangs rgyas su gzhug ma nus kyis/ 
414a7(1): da ni kho bos dge sbyong ga'u ta ma srog dang 'bral gyis khyod kyis sus bsad dam gang tu bsad pa ma smra shig/ des smras pa/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ 
414a8(1): ji tsam na lho phyogs nas 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs nas lnga sbyin gyis de ba kug ste smras pa/ kye slob dpon khyod kyis mi lnga brgyas
414b1(1): 'ben pa de sa bu'i bstsogs nus sam/ des smras pa 'phags pa nus so// des dril bu tig gi ngogal brgya song ri ba byin zhing tshe stong gi g+ha yang byin+da nas smras pa/ 
414b2(1): gnas gang na bcom ldan 'das bcugs pa'i de'i drang zad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro'i steng der stsogs chos shig/ sgyogs 'ben pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag kyang 'khod
414b3(1): du bcu gag/ gnas gzhan zhog tu gnyis brgya lnga bcu 'khod du bcug nas brtse pa/ gal te dge sbyong pa'u tam stsogs kyis ma sod na khyed cag gis song
414b4(1): cig de'i don tu gnas gzhan dang de'i don du gnas gnyen tu yang mi rnams khong du bcug nas thams cad la bsgo ba khyod cag gang gi dge sbyong go'u tu ma 'ongs pa dang de
414b5(1): ngag gis sod cig/ bdag nyid kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas/ 'di rnams kyis shor dang bdag gis bsad do/ snyam mo/ ji tsam na mi lnga brgyas
414b6(1): sgyogs 'phen par brtsams te/ spras pa su'i phyir sgyogs 'bad/ ji tsam nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shod na bzhugs pa mthongad nas/ de rnams kyis
414b7(1): spros pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag rang gi srog gtang ba ni tha'i lha dang mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas dgrangs pa ni de lta ma yin gyis stsogs por ro zhes de rnams kyis
414b8(1): skyugs por nas/ byargod kyi phung po'i ril phan tshun du rgyu zhing gnas gang na gnas babs na/ lnga sbyin gyis mi mthong bar 'gyur snyam mo// de rnams kyi bas
415a1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs su chud nas/ themaskas zhig btsugs pa dang de rnams kyis themaskas de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
415a2(1): shes ldan dag grem skas 'di sus btsugs snyam na/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yin no snyam nas/ de rnams lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la sems cad/ 
415a3(1): par dad par gyur te/ them skas de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag 'dul ba kho na la ltos nas/ bya rgod
415a4(1): kyi ri la 'chag cing bzhugs so/ de nas de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te chos mnyin pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'dug go// 
415a5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen pa nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtog par
415a6(1): gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas de rnams kyis 'dzag ma tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu 'gro ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
415a7(1): bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong ba dang lan gsum du ched du brjod pas/ ched du brjod pa btsun pa bdag cig la bsam bgyis mos lags/ 
415a8(1): lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags dge sbyong dang bram
415b1(1): ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang brdungs lnga dang
415b2(1): rnams su ni rab tu banas/ 'khor ba'i mthu nAM bgyis/ khrag dang mtsha' ra'i rgya mtsha ni b+har ba skams rus pa'i ri ba las ni bskal ngan song gi sgo rnams
415b3(1): ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni byi/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig chags la lta ba'i ri rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba yis shes kyi
415b4(1): rjes bcom nas// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum su bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags s+ho/ bdag
415b5(1): drug bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng sngan cha
415b6(1): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang sbas te/ skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams
415b7(1): blang bar brtsams so// 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon yang 'din sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgongs par byed pa yin no// snyam du bsam
415b8(1): nas de rnams kyi phyi bzhin them skas la babs nas mu tig gi ngo shal brgya stong ri ba khyer te bros so// lha sbyin ni rdo ba 'phen pa la dga' bas yang dang
416a1(1): rang du bkra bam/ mngangs sa sam sa/ rang nyid kyis milnga brgya po bzhin khrid de/ bya rgod kyi baphung po'i ril 'jigs pa
416a2(1): brtsams pa na/ mi lnga brgya pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos nyan pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang lhag par yang mi bzod pa skyes te/ phyogs gzhan zhig
416a3(1): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'a 'dzegs dang / ji tsam no 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon yang bros par mthong nas/ de rang nyid kyis 'khor lnga brgya dang sgyogs 'phangs
416a4(1): bar brtsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ de nyid kyis tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za
416a5(1): bar byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas
416a6(1): mi lnga brgya pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shes ldan dag lha sbyin kun nas dkris pa'i drag po la gnas nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol 'dzeg gis dang
416a7(1): shig/ 'di dag ni las yin no// de nas mi lnga brgya po de dag zos so// lha rnams kyi shes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas de nas gnod sbyin lag
416a8(1): nardo rje 'di snyam du sems te/ lha sbyin ni bcom ldan 'das dkrongs pa'i phyir pha rol gnon pa byed do snyam du bsams nas/ gnod sbyin kum b+hi ra gang na bder
416b1(1): song ste phyin pa dang / gnod sbyin kum bIr la 'di skad ces smras so// lha sbyin mi bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol stsogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la rdo ba 'phen par rtsom la/ 
416b2(1): bcom ldan 'das ni khyod kyi gnas na bzhugs pa/ de la kho bos 'bad de rje ba bang snang la rdo rjes bye mar blag ma gal ten dum bung blugs pa'i dum bu bcom ldan
416b3(1): 'das kyi steng du 'bab par 'gyur gyis khyod kyis grogs gyis shig/ des smras pa bka' bzhin 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das ni bla gab med pa na bzhugs nas/ 
416b4(1): ri'i phug tu gshegs so// lha sbyin 'khor lnga brgyas bskyogs drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la rdo 'phangs so// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i rdo rjes byed byas pa las
416b5(1): de'i byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su ltung du chab gnod sbyin gum bi ras legs par ma zin pas des bsad nas rdo ba'i dum bu yang ba zhig gas bcom ldan 'das
416b6(1): kyi zhabs la rma byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ gang tu gnas na las kyis mi rdzi ba'i/ 
416b7(1): sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te// bar snang nyid min rgya mtsho'i nad min zhing // ri'i phug tu zhugs pa 'ang ma yin no// gnod sbyin kum bA ri yang dge
416b8(1): pa'i sems kyis shi ste shi nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gya charnam pa rnams kyi gnas su skyes so// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu dang bu mo ni skyes nas/ ring po
417a1(1): mgon par sems skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas 'chi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o// 
417a2(1): des gnod sbyin las dang shi ste 'phos pa dang / sum cu rtsa sum pa'i lha gya nom rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas
417a3(1): yin pa mthong ste/ de nas gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ zhag len nas bcom ldan 'das la ltar 'gro ba'i ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin gyis
417a4(1): mal bdag gis zhag la ma lon bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam nas/ de nas gnod sbyin byed pa'i lha'i bu
417a5(1): rna cha gdu ba khor dri med cing g.yo ba thogs la do shUl dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas/ de nyid kyi tshogs mtshan mo lha rnams kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang ku mu
417a6(1): tra dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man+ta ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
417a7(1): la me tog gas ga ta/ bamam ldan 'das kyi rgyun sder chos mnyen pa'i phyir 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bgal nyal bdang
417a8(1): khams dang / rang bzhin thug su chud nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bani sa sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas sngon gnod kyi
417b1(1): byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'dzags pa la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa mthong nas
417b2(1): lan gsum du ched du tshe nang du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag la phas ma lags/ mas ma legs/ rgyal bas ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags
417b3(1): drug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dag stong dang zam zas ma la gyis gang
417b4(1): lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de khrags dang mchil ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral// ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bkum
417b5(1): mtho ris dang thar ba'i sgo rnams ni bye/ lha dang mi rnams su ni bdag rab tu gzhag go// yang khyed mthus nyes pa mang ldan mi bzad pa'i// ngan sa tshad lam
417b6(1): bkag bsod nams bzang ba'o// me thA ras phye zhing bdag ni mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang thob par 'gyur// khyeng la brten nas shin tu rnam par
417b7(1): mig/ nyes thal dag pa de ring bdag gis thos pa// go 'bang zhi ba 'phags pa dkyus thob ste// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal lags so// 'a
417b8(1): bas man sna dang mas mtshang ba// kye dang mang dngan 'tshabral ba'o// srid pa cad du mthong bar rab dga' ba// thub pa dang khyong mthong ba'i 'bras tha
418a1(1): mchis// de nas do shal rab 'phyang dgar gyur pa/ nabs gnyis la ni mngon par phyag brtu la nus// dgra 'phrul pa
418a2(1): la g.yas nas bskor mdzad nas// lha'i 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la sod // de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshod pa khe spogs rnyed pa
418a3(1): lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul dor rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur 'byor pa
418a4(1): gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang chu smad la mi nyul bar
418a5(1): rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson paso gnas pa na/ de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po de mthong ngo / mthong nas the tsom zos te/

425b5(1): bo thal mo sbyar te nus pa/ kha dog sna chog stong gis bkra ba yi// cho ga rnam zhal gyi sgon byung gyur pa// ji ltar gdug ni shang bar gyur pa ltar// de yis phyog kun tu snang bar bgyis// yang tshig

425b7(1): ston mi mdzad/ de srang brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas// rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog/ nyan par 'chal ba nyan pa po rnam kyi/ khri tsam skyes pa gsung gi brtan pa dang // dam pa bzang po dag sde
425b8(1): mchu sa/ rgya rgyal sa zungasan pams rdzog yangs rgyas mas pa khrong 'ayum ma sa/ na pa'i sring 'phrum pa nga gi tshu sa ma ga lalal khamatha na

426a7(1): she na/ bden pa'i tshig gis 'di yis su// rma'i 'dzag pa chad par shog/ bden pa gsol zin pa'i mod kho nar khrag de mi 'dzag par gyur pa dang /

426b1(1): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi dang rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs phal cher thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur to// 
426b2(1): bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du gang zhig ji ltar dpyad byed pa de la de bzhin du rjes su dgyes par mdzad de/ de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro//

426b4(1): bden pa gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khrag chad par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'ba' zhig

427b1(1): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no drang srong yin pa de ni 'od srung stobs bcu dang ldan pa 'di nyid yin te/ de yang 'dis bden pa gsol bas nga sos

432a1(1): thabs shig bshams te nya bkur nas btang ngo // de nang du zhugs pa kho na na/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ na pa'i khye'u sman dngags

432a5(1): tog dang / 'bras bu tshol ba des de mthong nas des bros pa mthong ngo // de'i phyi bzhin stegs shing rgyags pa'i mi de rnams kyis/ mi de la dris pa kye nang rje bong chod dang kha dog
432a6(1): 'di 'dra ba'i mi 'ga' zhigalam 'di nas 'gro ba khyod kyi ma mthong ngam/ des smras pa mthong spelam 'di nas song ngo // de rnams de'i rjes bzhin du dong ngo po/ de yang ri ngor
432a7(1): der btso bla ga mkhan zhig gi khyim du zhugs nas/ de la ji ltar gyur basmras pa/ stegs ma'i mi rnams kyis ri bor btsal bar brtsams pa na/ btso blag mkhan gyis
432a8(1): thos kyi thub po'i nang du bcu gnas/ bong bul ba kal te 'a nas phyir byungaste/ khrus byed pa'i ser khyer nas btang ba dang langs te phyogs bzhir bltas nas bros
432b1(1): so/ der yang mi gzhan zhig gis mthong nas/ des snyegs ma'i mi rnams la smras pa/ shes sngan dag khyed gang gi don tu ri 'or 'tsho ba'i mi de ni lam 'di nas song gis myur
432b2(1): du deng shig/ de yang zong gzhan zhig tu snum mkhan gyi khyim du zhugs nas/ des de la ji ltar gyur pa slang nas smras pa/ mchi'i snam po la ning bar bltas pa zhig gyis
432b3(1): shog/ des smras pa/ bdag gis sngon man 'ga' yang mchil lham de lta bu byeng mamyong ngo / des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo gros sna tshogs rang bzhin du ma ste/ 
432b4(1): de dgasung gcig tu ni gzhal pa med// ldem mkhan khyod kyis nga'i tshig bzhin 'dir// rting pa gang de mdun tu blta bar gyis/ des lham mkhan de la slabs nas lham
432b5(1): mkhan gyis de 'dra ba'i mchil lham zhig byas so// ri 'or der bas bskor ba yin pas des mchil lham de gyon nas/ sdor khur nas 'dzul te bros so// snyegs
432b6(1): ma'i mi rnams kyis 'chil snyam gyi rjes bzhin ring 'or de nyid bskor ro// de yang zlos nas tshur zhugs pa dang / klu rnams kyi gnas su khrid do// rgyal pos
432b7(1): gcig nas gcig tu rgyu pa las de ji ltar klu rnams kyis klu'i gnas su khrid do zhes thos su/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dganga'i
432b8(1): yul na sbrul khas sdigs ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad nga'i spyan sngar khug shig/ de rnams kyis yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sbrul khas sdigs rnams rgyal po la
433a1(1): phul lo// rgyal pos de rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la klu'i gnas che ge mo zhes bya bar zung shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
433a2(1): sbrul khas sdigs thams cad kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas klu'i gnas su dong ngo / 'bro gcig na/ gnod sbyin ser skya zhes bya ba khrag dang sha za ba zhig yod do// des skrag pas gcan
433a3(1): zan rnams kyis kyang 'brog de yongs su spangs nas/ mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgongs te/ de ser skya'i 'brog ces bya bar grags so// sbrul khas sdigs rnams kyis sngags
433a4(1): sa kyi mthus ji sngar klu de la gnod par 'gyur ba de ltar byas pas/ de skra gnas de ser skya'i 'bro gde rgal bar mi nus par bor ro// klu rnams kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag gis
433a5(1): 'di ltar de ser skya'i 'bro ga las ma bsgral ba ni ma lags pa zhig byas te/ de yang gnod sbyin ser skyas bsang la bdag cag kyang de'i phyir gtses par 'don/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ 
433a6(1): klu'i rgyal po des smras pa/ don de sbrusprul khas srib rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag 'khrugs par byas pa de ni bdag cag gis thabs kyis bsad pa nyid de
433a7(1): 'di ltar ser skya'i 'brog tu bora'o// sbrul khas sdigs rnams kyis don de rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de ltan 'od kyang 'tshol cig/ ser skya'i
433a8(1): 'bro gan phan tshur khyam par brtsams pan gnod sbyin ser skya yang phyogs shig khyi rnams kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug go// de dang khyi rnams kyis rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong
433b1(1): nas/ des bsams pa ci 'dis bdag shi bar gyur na// zhes thos nas/ des rang 'dir 'ongs sam snya ma mo/ des de la khyi rnams spyad pa las/ de bros te shing ljon pa zhigs
433b2(1): 'dzegs pa dang / khyi rnams dang ser skyes ldan shing gi drung du bskrad de/ ser skyas smras pa/ kye rang rje khyod kyis ser skya'i 'brog na/ mi ma yin pa ser skya zhes bya ba
433b3(1): gnas te/ der song ba yin pa de des gsod par 'gyur ro// zhes ma thos sam/ khyod dus la bab kyi bo bos shig/ des smras pa/ ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du 'dug go/ gnod
433b4(1): sbyin ser skya bus spyad cings te/ sgrim pas 'dug nas/ der yur ba na des de'i steng du gos shing bor ro// khyi rnams kyi bsems pa/ 'di ni mi de kho na lhung ba yin no snyam
433b5(1): nas/ de rnams kyis gnod sbyin ser skya zos ras dong ngo // de wAn shidru dal gyis dal gyis babs te song nas/ de dang de kho na 'khor zhing bsams pa/ bdag gi nang
433b6(1): po drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba zhig khrod kyis de'i drung du 'gro'o// drang srong de la yang ri 'or zhig ru skyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang / me tog dang 'bras bu phun
433b7(1): sum tshogs pa shing rnam pa sna tshogs tshang tshing gis mdzes par byas pa/ byas tshogs smad 'byin pa ni ga yod de de rim gyis thos pa cig nas gcig tu brgyud pas/ de'i drung
433b8(1): 'ongs nas gnyen du 'brel pas smras te 'dug go// der yang rgyal pos mi rnams kyis btsal te/ de rnams kyis de bzung bar brtsams pan las de ri'i g.yangs nas bdag nyid
434a1(1): mchongs te/ de mchongs pa na mi zhig gis gtsug phud nas bzung ba las/ gtsug pud byung nas lhung ngo / de rnams kyis bsams pa 'di ni shi bar
434a2(1): 'dod do nas gtsug pu khyer de rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ de rnams kyis sbas pa ldan pa'i khye'u stan sa gas mkhand kum nas gtsug phud kyang 'di lags s+ho/ rgyal po mgunas des de
434a3(1): rnams la longs spyad kyis bzo sha' byas so// de nas drang srong gi skyed mos chas na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de drang srong de la smras pa/ khyod kyis tsha bo ni sdug bsngal mi zad bdo
434a4(1): panya mang ba tho ba ni ma dgongs sam/ des smras pa/ gal te bdag gis ma bsams par gyur na/ de ring nyid du srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// drang srong de ni rig stegs dang gsang
434a5(1): sngags 'chang ba yin te/ gang gis ni skyes pa bud med du byung zhing phyir yang gyur pa de lta bu'i rigasngags shes pas des de la rigasngags de bslabs te smras pa/ da ni song la 'jigs
434a6(1): pa dang bag tsha ba med pas 'dug shig/ des rig sngags kyis dpes bskrun par mi nus pas bud med kyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ wA ra Na sir song ste rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal
434a7(1): na 'dug pa bskyed mos tshal gyi srungasams mthong nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ des myur bar myur bar song nas/ rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud la smras pa/ lha skyed mos tshal na bud med gzugs
434a8(1): bran sum tshogs pa daral bab bzhig mchis so// des bsgo ba khrid la shog shig/ des dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid nas/ de la rgyal po'i
434b1(1): ma'i mu khyud lhag par chags par gyur pa dang / des skabs snyed nas dben pa na 'dug pa las bsad de slar yang rig sngags bzlas te skyes par gyur pa dang / de nas rang nyid kyis cod pan
434b2(1): bcings te/ rnon po phyug 'dugs 'pho bar byas nas/ rgyal srid la 'dug go// lhas tshigs su bcang de smras pa/ gang gi mgom bcad pade bsad min/ phyir yang langs nas las ni
434b3(1): byed par 'gyur/ ji ltar sman sngags mkhan de grags snyed nas/ sraN+Di can bus bu de bsang yin/ dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po sra rtsi ldan gyi bu nyi ma'i
434b4(1): mu khyud ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni lce sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spyan sngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de na yang 'disang la shar gnyer la da ltar yang 'dis shar
434b5(1): gnyer ro// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis nga la shar gnyer ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ ri 'or zhig na nor bu mkhan gnyis shig gnas te/ de gnyis kyis lam po che dang
434b6(1): grong dgos so// de'i tshe tshong pa 'byor pa yongs su zad pa zhig yod ba de nor bu snong khyer nas ri 'or der phyir to// de nas lam gyis du babar ngal sos nas/ nor bu mkhan gcig
434b7(1): gis drung du song ste smras pa/ nor bu'i snod 'di rin thang tshod cig/ des de'i rin byang chu zhig tu bcad pa dang / des smras pa 'di ltar kho bo'i longs spyod las nyams kyang / shes
434b8(1): rab las ma yin pas kho bos 'di ci ri bsde zhes na de skad du smras paci'i thatshig de de'i drung rnaMs mog ste/ gcig shos kyis drung du song sde smras pa/ nor bu'i snong 'di rin thang tsho
435a1(1): cig/ des de'i rin thang brag tu dbang bcang nas/ des smras pa/ 'di nyid kyi na re shig bdag la mi 'dog go/ des smras pa/ ci bdon
435a2(1): bde byin la khyer chug/ des blangs sa/ nor bu mkhan cig shos pa nges byas nas/ de mi bzod pa de skyes te/ de'i drung du song nas bdag gis khyim du 'di tho ga myur khrid cing bdag
435a3(1): gis 'di'i rin thang gcad na/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir bkum/ de gnyis pan tshun kho na byung bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snya ba du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nor bu'i mkhan
435a4(1): nor bu'i snod rin thang rlung ngur gcod pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i dus kyi nor m+b+ha khan tso gi shos kyi/ rin thang thog tu gcod pa gang yin pa de ni zhing
435a5(1): yin te/ de na yang ded phan tshun mi mthun par gyur te/ da ltar yang nged pan tshun mi mthun par gyur to// gzhan yang ji ltar ded ci lngar mi mthun par de nyon cig/ dge slong
435a6(1): dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig gcig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mthung
435a7(1): spyod drir byed do// de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dpa' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan ni gan chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgya
435a8(1): dam gra no ba na khye'u nig btsas so/ bcas nas de'i rtseng mi cirje/ nges bsams pa/ khye'u bsar gtsug pa'i phyir gzhan nig blang ngo snyam nas
435b1(1): des gzhan nag blangs te/ de nga sngar rtsi rtse bar byang dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las kyang khye'u zhig btsas nas de yang shi'o// khyim bdag des bsams
435b2(1): ba gas te gnan blangs na de yang 'chi bar 'gyur rjes/ khye'u thu za shos kyi khyim phu da par bya'o snyam nas/ des khye'u phru za shos kyi khyim phub pa las/ de las khye'u dang
435b3(1): bumo mang bcus so// de'i chung mdes smras pa/ rje'i sras khye'u 'di khyod kyi cir 'gyur des smras pa/ spun du 'ong dru bo yin no// des smras pa/ rje'i sras khyod la na sras
435b4(1): mnga' la 'di ni gcig pu legs ma 'dir mdang 'di khyimadang 'dis spyod mnam par 'tshal lam/ des smras pa/ bzeng mo 'din 'jigs rten gyi chos yin no// des smras
435b5(1): pa/ rje'i sras gal te de spyan 'di bum shig/ 'dod pa la so sor brten pa ni sdig pa'i las mi byed pa ci yang med pas/ des me tog dang 'bras bul gling nas dgon par khrid
435b6(1): de rdos bsnun te bsad do dge slong da ga ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gi phu bro shos gang yin pa 'di ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nu bo
435b7(1): shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis ngal mi mthun par byas so// de sngar yang 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas so/ gzhan yang der ji ltar mi mthun par gyur
435b8(1): bde zhon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'od ni gan bram ze nig gnas pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de dang de ldan rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur
436a1(1): spyod par byed do/ de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur tong zla ba brgyang dam dgu yon
436a2(1): pa dang / bum gzugs bzang po bstan sdu ga pa mdzes pa zhig bcas so// bram ze nges pasems pa/ de ring bdag gi khyim du bram ze sres bsod pa sems kyi phyir zhugs pade
436a3(1): la bu mo 'di bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin no snyam mo/ ji tsam na bram ze khye'u zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir de'i khyim du zhugs nas/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ bsod snyoms
436a4(1): byin cig/ bram ze des de la bos te smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u du bro gnon du 'di bdag gis khyod la bas de snyoms kyi gor sbyin no// des smras pa/ de ring mi blang ni nyi ma da
436a5(1): yung tsam dag bskur nas blang ngo zhes de song ngo / ji tsam na bram ze'i gzhan zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir de'i khyim du zhugs nas/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ bsod snyoms byin

436a7(1): bsod snyoms la zhugs na/ del ci'i phyir ma byin/ des smras pa/ de na re rgyu skar mi bzang zhes zer ro// des smras pa/ gal ted ldan blang bar bar be rgya'o// bram zes
436a8(1): dbang/ khyong drus 'i drir dza nga res tshigs su brdud nga rnams blab par gyur ma/ deng ga thams ca mdzung bste/ rgyu mar thams cad 'azang po yim
436b1(1): nim thams cad dgeng yin/ chu skar rtsi bskur len pa'i/ mi rnams don mirnams 'gyur te/ 'di'i don ni rgyu skar yin/ mar ma rnams kyis ci zhig bya/ zhes smras nas des khyer
436b2(1): te song ngo // bram ze gzhan po ngas/ bram ze de las bram ze che ge mo zhes bya bas bu mo khyer ro zhes thos nas/ de de'i drung du song ste/ smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u bdag gis bu mo de sngar tho

436b4(1): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drim ze'i khye'u sa ma shos gang yin pa de ni b+h+rUM sprin 'di ning yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyis bram ze'i khye'u phyim shos gang yin pa de ni
436b5(1): nga nyid yin te/ de na yang da dang mi mthun par gyur te/ da ltar yang 'di de dang mi mthun par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas
436b6(1): pan bzhugs so// de'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i glang po che gdug pa nor skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de nyin re zhing khyim nas phyung na/ skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do// rgyal po'i
436b7(1): kha na sa gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs kyis rgyal ngom skyes dpral gsos pa dadapag/ sA glang po che'i gdug pa nor skyong zhidragasar zhing gnas nas byung ngan/ lam pa tsho dang srang
436b8(1): bzhi mdo dang sum mdo rnams su/ skye bo mang po kha 'dog par bgyid kyis/ lhas glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams la bka' stsal te/ ci nas kyang gdugs re zhing mi byung bar/ sad
437a1(1): bu byin par yang dril sngags su sub ba'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya dang shig/ rgyas pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes par dag
437a2(1): glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams khug shig/ de rnams kyis glang po 'i 'dul mkhan rnams bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dang rgyal po'i kha ba na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs

437b1(1): nor skyong snang shig/ des smras pa 'phags pa de bzhin du bgyi lags kyis/ 'on kyang 'pho byi la la yang mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas lha sbyin ma skyes dgra gangan bder song ste phyin nas/

437b4(1): ba 'dul bar mdzad pa yin no zhes ma thos sam/ des smras pa/ gal te mdul ba 'dus pa yin par 'gyur ni/ 'dis re shig bad ba kho na 'dul bar 'gyur grang zhes des de la
437b5(1): 'ol byi smras nas/ glang po che 'dul mkhan rnams kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ lha sa yang bdag gis rig par byas kyis/ khyed kyis sang glang po che dam pa nor slong sdong cig

437b7(1): spyong gtong gis de bas khyed cag thams cad sang rang rang srung bas sgoms shig ces bsgrugs pa/ khyim pang pa des thos nas/ bdag 'dra bar bur ngan pa/ bdag gis sangs rgyas la

438a4(1): tu gshegs shig/ zhal zas dang btung ba'i'atshal te bdag nyid mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod sems las chu dur gyis la/ zhal

438a6(1): gshegs so// de nas khyim bdag de yi dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ zhal zas dang btu nga sta gon byas bdan bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skrod cing 'dug
438a7(1): go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' chos gos bsnams lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs pa na/ glang po
438a8(1): dam pa nor skyong yang smad do// glang po che dam pa nor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / mthong nas kyang 'gying zhing skad phyung nas bcom ldan 'das
438b1(1): gdan bder logs su mongs shugs ci yod pas pang thag pas btsugs so// de nas sku sbyin ma skyes dgra'i grogs can steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir 'dzegs nas dge sbyong
438b2(1): go'u tam gsad pal bas ning 'jug na/ denas su sbyin gyis btsom man 'das mthong sa/ dga' ba dang mgu 'dang btu ba' bas bzeng bsud de/ tshigs su bcang pas
438b3(1): smras pa/ glang po che'i tsal yas bltas na// khyod kyi gli chen mthus brdzi sebs// shAkya'i bu khyod de ringadadu// na byos bcas te re snyam med/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
438b4(1): sprul pa/ la sbyin ngas khyod da la ni// khyad bas co 'dri smra bar byed// stobs bcu'i stobs ldan rmad byung ba// stobs kyi mthul nga bltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
438b5(1): kyis phyag g.yas pa'i mthil nas/ seng ge ral pa can lnga sprul to// des de rnams kyi dri tshor nas/ gcin dang gtug pa shor te bros par brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'ad
438b6(1): nyid kyi zhabs drung grang zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par/ phyogs thams cad 'bar/ rab tu' bar/ kun tu rabatu' bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur par byin gyis
438b7(1): brlabs so// de nas glang po che nor skyong phan tshun du brgyug par brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung grang zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par phyogs
438b8(1): thams cad 'bar rabaca' bar/ kun tur btso'i bar ti/ me lce gcig tu gyur par mthong ngo // nor skyong 'khrugs pa mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ma gtags pa
439a1(1): dge slong thams cad thos so// de nas nor skyong bregs pa'i shugs dang bral nas ngas gyis 'gro bar 'thos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song
439a2(1): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang bkra shis dang g.yung drung khyil bas brgyan pa bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas
439a3(1): de'i mgo la byugs te tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ glang che gtso bo la ni mtho ma 'tshal// glang chen de la mtho 'tsham sdug bsngal 'gyur/ gtso la gnod pa byas pa pha rol du/ 
439a4(1): 'gro ba bzang por 'gyur ba ma yin no// bzhin bzangs khyod re shig sngon gyis nyes par spyad pas/ smad bdud 'gro'i skye gnas skyes na/ khyod nga dung gzhan gyi srog gcod
439a5(1): cing / gzhan gyi srog gcod pas yongs su dga' bar byed/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyod kyi 'gro ba cir 'gyur/ skye bo ni gang / tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/ bzhin bzangs
439a6(1): de lnga bas na/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas/ ngal sems mngon par dad par gyis la/ ci nas/ 
439a7(1): kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas la 'dod chags dang bram par gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas/ khyim bdag gi khyim gang na bder gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// 
439a8(1): nor skyong yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin song ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang du gshegs pa na/ de sgo drung du bsdang ba las bcom ldan 'das ma mthong nas/ khyim gzhig
439b1(1): bar brtsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim shel gyi rang bzhin du smras nas/ de sa sangs rgyas kyi sku grib ma med par snang ngo / des bcom ldan 'das mthong nasam bci
439b2(1): go/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod gsol nas/ yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so// de bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin
439b3(1): song ba'i skabs de/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal pos rig par byas so/ ma skyes dazas su sbyin la smras pa/ khyod kyis bdag la gnod pa byas te/ glang po che dab pa 'dis brten
439b4(1): nas mtshams gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams kho bo la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur na/ de yang khyod kyis dul bar byas so// de cang mi smra bar 'dug go// rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo
439b5(1): ba/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das phyir byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ glang po che dam pa nor skyong ji sngar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi 'gyur bar sgro tshod la nog shig
439b6(1): blon po rnams kyi glang po 'dus mkhan rnams la bsngo ba/ glang po che dam pa nor srung ji sngar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi ba ni na 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar snga tshod la zhog shig/ 
439b7(1): des bcom ldan 'das mi mthong nas/ rdog pas sA brdzisanas shi bla dang / rgyal chen ba ni'i rigs kyi lha rnams su skyes so// 'dul ba ga ni du bu bzhi pa dam po
439b8(1): brgya bzhi pa// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am/ lde'i bum+bo ring po malon par sems gsum skyes par 'gyur na/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa
440a1(1): dang / sos gang gis yin pa'o// des glang po che las 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
440a2(1): la sems mngon par dad par byas pa yin par mthong nas/ des sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag mun nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
440a3(1): blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gi zhag malon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas
440a4(1): sngon glang po chi byed byed pa'i lha'i rnacha dri ma med cing g.yo ba thogs la/ do shal se mo ngas sus brgyan nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rnams kyi me tod At+pal dang pad+ma dang ku mu
440a5(1): dang pad+ma dkar po dang / man+dAr ba rnams kyi thu ba bkang ste/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas/ bcom ldan
440a6(1): 'das la me tog gis gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang bag la nyal dang
440a7(1): khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa ba ni/ so sor yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad pas/ sngon
440a8(1): gyi glang po che lha'i bus 'jigs tshogs la balnga ba'i ri'i rtse me nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rje bcom nas/ rgyu du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ bden pa
440b1(1): mthong nas/ lan sum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdagal bsam bgyis te/ mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags lha rnams kyis ma lags
440b2(1): sdug bsam lags/ rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pasams gas/ dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa de/ bcom
440b3(1): sngon 'das kyis bdag po mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya batsho ni skam/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgom rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgra
440b4(1): rnamasna na phye/ bdagralnga dang mi rnams su ni bzhag yang gsol pa/ khyod mthu sar 'dra ga nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/ ngan song shul bkag bsod nams ra bldan pa'i/ 
440b5(1): mtho ras 'gro ba bye zhing bdag gis ni/ mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/ shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/ de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing / 
440b6(1): go 'phang ni ba 'phags par dgyes tho ba ste/ sdug bsngas rgya mtsho'i pha rol rnam par gyur/ 'gro ba sna min mi dang lhas mchod pa/ skye dang rga ngon dang 'chi bral ba/ srid pa
440b7(1): stong du mthong b.rar rab dkon pa/ thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras du mchis/ de nas gdung byas de shel rab 'phyang bas/ zhe bsol phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas
440b8(1): dam thul g.yas nas gcon du bskor byas te/ sna'i 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' laso / de nas sngor glang po che byed byed pa'i sgra'i bus tshang bas khe spogs rnyed pa lnga
441a1(1): bu dang / zhing ba la me tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bos yul ngor rgyal bsdu bu dang / nad pa nang thams cad bas yongs su thar pa lta bur
441a2(1): 'byor pa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi zhal bar rnal 'byor la rjes
441a3(1): brtson pas gnas pa na/ de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sa spyan sngar na snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang yid gnyis su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ mdang
441a4(1): gsum bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshongs pa'am/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'chis lags sam/ 
441a5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgang la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ni/ mi mjed kyi bad go po tshangs pa yang ma yin/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang
441a6(1): ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin te/ de lta mod kyi/ dge slong dag khyed kyis glang po che dam pa nor skyong zhes bya ba/ 'di ltar gdug pa/ 'di lngar gtum pa des
441a7(1): de bzhin gshegs par gongs pa'i phyir ba rol gnon pa byas pa gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so/ ngas de btul nas ngal mngon par dad par byas
441a8(1): te shi nas/ rgyal chen ba ni'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin te/ de ma dang sum nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs nas nas/ ngas de la chos bshad de/ bden pa mthong bar
441b1(1): byas nas rang gi gnas su song ba yin no// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nor skyong
441b2(1): gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gror skyes lags/ las ci zhig bgyis nas des rgyan chen bzhi'i ris kyis lha rnams kyis nang du skyes nas bden
441b3(1): pa bzhi'i mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nor skyong 'di nyid kyis mas tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'dod
441b4(1): pa bzhin pa nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag kyang byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dgal 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar
441b5(1): gong ma bzhin du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams tshe la nyi khri brub pa na 'jig rten du ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rig pa dang zhabs
441b6(1): su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha bo sbyor ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ 'od srung zhes bya ba byung ste/ de grong khyeras
441b7(1): ran ci sir nye bar brten nas/ drang srong snga ba'i ri dgas kyi gnags na bzhugs so/ de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ zhalang byed pa na/ den 'di'i bslab pa'i gni phra mo rnams la
441b8(1): gus par ma byas pa/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas drang 'gror skyes par gyur to/ de nas 'dis dge 'dunas bkur stir byas pa sams kyi rnam par smi pa gang yin pa des/ bza'
442a1(1): ba dang / btung ba thob par gyur to// nga la sems mngon par dad par byas te shi ba gang yin pa des/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha

442a3(1): la mkhas par byas/ skye mched la mkhas par byas/ rten cing 'brel pA laM byung ba la mkhas par byas pa gang yin pa des lhar gyur nas/ nga las mden pa mthong bar bya
442a4(1): so// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes byi ba nas/ las gcig tu dkar ba la rtsal bar byas ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis
442a5(1): de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// sdom ni/ dang pa gang rgyangs dbyung ba dang / rI dgas rul dang spre'u dang / glang po che dang byi la dang / 
442a6(1): ba lang zla brdo ba dang / glang chen wa dang bram ze'o// dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ dge slong dag the tshom thams cad ga cod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
442a7(1): 'das ldan zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyas yongs su btang ni/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang ba la gzigs/ 
442a8(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang kun dga' bo 'di nga yongs su ma btang ba de nyon
442b1(1): cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba mtsho chen po ma dros pa na drang pa'i dpon po yul 'khor skyong ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ de la bu gnyis yod pa/ gang ba dang bzhin rgyas
442b2(1): byab/ gang ba ni phung po yin no// bzhin rgyas ni nu bo yid no// de gnyis kyis las gang ba ni gtub pa/ brlang ba gzu lums can zhig ste/ rtag tu dad pa rnams la sdig
442b3(1): pAr byed de/ kha cig la ni sgro 'byin kha cig las ni sder pos rma 'byin par byed cing de lta bu dang gzhan yang gnod pa brgya phrag dag byed de/ ngang pa rnams nyi ma re re zhing drad pa rnams
442b4(1): kyi dpon po yul 'khor skyong gi gan du dong ste/ rigs par byed nas nges bsams pa/ gang ba gtum pa rlang ba gzu lums can yin pas gal te bdag gis 'di rgyal tshab
442b5(1): la bzhag na/ bdag shi nas/ 'dis dad pa'i tshogs bshis par 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o skam mo// des gang ba dang bzhin rgyas gnyis bkug
442b6(1): nas sgo ba/ 'bab chu'i dor dang mtshon dang mtshe'u rnams bltas nas/ nga'i drung du thog mar su 'ongs pa/ de dad pa rnams kyi dpon por gzhug rga/ de gnyis kyang gcig
442b7(1): 'grin pa'i phyir 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang dong ste/ de gnyis kyis phan tshun 'bab chu 'dor dang mtshe'u rnams bltas nas mthar gyis grong khyer wA ra NA sir phyin to// de'i tshe grong khyer
442b8(1): wa ra NA sir na/ rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gdan/ rgyal srid du 'jug go/ des wA ra Ni sin skyed mos tsha
442b9(1): mi ma mi mi'i tus ldan nas bya bo'i rje cherba bas ches zang par du chis pa nim nor 'acug sa/ de rgyangs the ba'i mnyis rnam pa choms / 
443a1(1): 'gram dang phyogs pa na kun tu ya mchog 'jas du shing sang drag dum bskyed / de ut+pa la dang / brlang ba/ ku mu ta dang / bad+mad dkar pos
443a2(1): grag par byas shing shing kyang cing dam ma mangs pa/ byam tshogs pa po spyad 'bying pa'i 'byor pa de shA zla de brjod nas/ rang pa gang 'khor lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te babs nas/ 
443a3(1): ci dga' ba'i spyod pas rtse bar brtsams so// btsun rgyas sa yang rang gi tshogs kyis smras pa/ khyod kyang po bsas rtsed mo gyis shig/ des smras pa/ re shi ba rgyal srid blangs
443a4(1): la de nas phyis logs sde brtse bar bya'o nas/ de rings par rings par song ste/ rgyal srid blangs so// de nas dang pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te wA ra NA sir tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du
443a5(1): babs te/ ba gaskyong zhing bag skyong zhing gnas pas rtse bar brtsams te/ de de sngar bag yod pas gnas pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ 
443a6(1): kye mngang ba'i dpon po mchog tu gzugs bzang ba bstan sdug pa/ gang nas 'dir 'ongs te/ gzugs bzang pos rgyun rgyu ba'i 'ang ba chags thams cad zil gyis mnan nas
443a7(1): chang ldan ma'i rdzing gi rgyud byed cing dga' bar gnas shing 'jig rten dga' bskyed par byed/ pA raNasi ran gnas pa'i skye rje rje tshogs thams cad kyis thos nas/ tshangs ldan
443a8(1): gyi rdzing kun nas bskor te/ de'i gzugs bzang po dang ba gsung ning gnas pa la rdog cing khong ngo // blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lnga dang pa rnams kyi dpor ba zhin
443b1(1): gang zhig gnas 'dir mchis te/ de cang ldan gyi rdzing 'dra ba bas nas/ dang ba brgya phrag du mas yongs su bskur cing gzugs bzang pos cha ban rgyu ba'i 'ang ba chags thams
443b2(1): cad zil gyis mnan nas/ 'jig rten dga' bar myed cing ba ga yod pa spyong ni mchis legs so// rgyal pas smras pa/ shes ldan dgal gte de lan bya rnams khrag shig/ 
443b3(1): rnams kyis bkug pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba/ shes snganang ga tshangs ldan gyi rdzing na/ ngang pa'i dpon po mchog du gzugs bzang ba ldan sdu gang zhig/ ge zhi ga ras 'ongs su
443b4(1): nyes thos kyis khyed kyis de cig pu sni sa ma snang bar zung la ngal phul cig/ de rnams kyis de mchog tu 'jam po sam snang bar bzung ba dang / des tshigs su bcud de smos pa/ kho
443b5(1): smi ni dam por bzung zin te/ mi'i dbang du song bas kho bos/ dpyad byar med kyis ngang pa'i tshogs ded de/ ma dros par ni myur du 'deng par gyis/ dad pa cig gis lnga brgyar mchong ba
443b6(1): ni bros so// gcig pu zhig skyes zin pa de nyid la mya ngan byed cing 'dug pa de bya ba rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes shing rgyal pos skra gnas ma bzung mes bsad de/ 
443b7(1): de rnams kyis ngang ba'i dpon po de khyer nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / cig shos ma bzung ba de yang chags pa'i spris bzung nas rang nyid 'ongs so// ngang pa'i dpon pa
443b8(1): rgyal po la phul ba dang rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dgacig shos 'di ci'i phyir khyer te 'ongs/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lA bdag cag gis 'dim bzung mod kyi rang
444a1(1): gams/ rnam panan bcung ma smra rlung ba/ gajam papar 'an de'i chung ma san das 'das kyis phywa

444a5(1): mtshang ba 'di dang yin no// den yang 'dirnams dang bar gyur bam nga yongs su btang ste/ kun dga' bo ngang par gyur pa ning yongs sum bdung ste/ daltar yang de 'di dag gis

444b2(1): gyi dbu gru ba na zhes bya ba dmag slong thub pa zhig 'ongs nas/ de blon pa na nig gis rgyal po la phrul to/ sa byam bum gyid b+hu tsun zhes bgyi 'ding mo ga sbyong thub pa 'dis
444b3(1): slad du lho phyogs kyi shul nas mchis kyis/ su 'di yongs su bzung ba'i rigs so// rgyal pos de yongs su bzung nas mdzes spyod kyi bgo bsha' yang byas sa/ ji tsam dus gan
444b4(1): zhigan rgyal po gang rgyangs can gyi yul na gzhan rgyal po rnams mthu dang dpung chen por gyur na// de rnams dpung gi tsho gas yan lag ben po// glang po che'i tshogs dang rnga pa'i tshogs
444b5(1): dang / shing rna pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu rlung gi tshogs go bskon gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang g.yul spang ba'i phyir sngags te bsdu'o// rgyal po gang rgyangs can gyis sa gzhan

444b7(1): rgyal po gang rgyangs can gyi blon po lnga brgya khyed cag la longs spyod ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag gis bgo she' bya'o zhes yod byed kyis kha drangs pa dang / de
444b8(1): kyis khas blangs so// de nas sa gzhan gi rgyal po rnams kyis slar yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bani po/ glang po che'i tshogs dang rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rnga pa
445a1(1): tshogs dang / dpung bu gyi tshogs ga bskon nas/ sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang g.yul spyad pa'i phyir sngags te bsu'o// gang rgyangs can
445a2(1): gyi blon po lnga brgya ga yul spyod pa na/ phyir lo gnas byam bum gyi dbyu gu can dam gasdong thu ba dang ldan cig/ g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa rgyal pos mthong nas bag tsha bar gyur pa
445a3(1): dang / byam bum gyi dbyu gu can dam ga slong thub kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni bya ma bum gyi dbyug/ yun ring po nas gnang ba yi/ grogs po kun gyis khyod ba
445a4(1): des de dag thams cad kha btag go// dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gang rgyangs can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya ma bum
445a5(1): gyi dbyu gu can gang yin pa de ni kun dga' ba nyid yin no/ blon po lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dganyid yin no/ de na yang 'di dag gisang yongs su btang
445a6(1): ngo/ daltar yang 'di dag gisang yongs su btang gi kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang ngo // gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang gi/ kun dga' bos
445a7(1): yongs su mi btang ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/ ri'i phyogs ni gan/ ri dgas kyi dpon por seng ger
445a8(1): gyur te/ de'i wAgam za ba wa lnga brgya rjes bzhin du'i phreng zhing ril nye bar brten te gnas so// seng ges srob chags rnams bsad de sha'i dam pa dang / khrag gi dam pa
445b1(1): 'thungs nas bor te 'grobs/ de rnamasangs bus dus ring mo nag 'das par gyur to// ji tsamadus gzhan nigani ridags kyi rgyal ba seng ge mtshan mo srog chags tshol ban/ 
445b2(1): 'dzin par ltung ba dang / la lnga brgya po de rnams las sas brgyar cig gis mtshang bas sor dong ste/ gcig pu ni gseng ge la rdog cing 'khron pa'i khar 'dug ste gang gis na
445b3(1): 'di byin par 'gyur pa'i thabs de ci yod snyam sems shing / de khron pa'i nyen kor du phan tshun sa ba las/ si tsaman khron pa dang ha cang yang mi ring bzhig na/ mtshe'u zhig ma
445b4(1): nas de brtags na phyogs gcig nas 'og blas bcu ga ste/ khron pa de mtshe'u'i chus bkang ba dang / seng ge rang nyid byung bar gyur to// lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ spobs
445b5(1): che ba'am gzhan yang rung / grogs po dag tu bya dgos te/ las ni khron po rnying pa nas/ seng ge byung bar gyur la ltos/ dge slong dgaci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i
445b6(1): dus kyi seng ge gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gcig po ni dge slong kun dga' bo yin no// wa gcig gis sna brgyar mtshang ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong
445b7(1): lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di dag gis nga yangs su btang gis kun dga' bas ni yongs su ma btang ngo // da ltar yang 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang gi kun
445b8(1): dge' bos yongs su ma btang ngo / gnam yang ji ltar 'di dag gsang yongs su btang na/ kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sdong byung ba byang
446a1(1): / chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/ ri'i phyogs zhig na/ ri dgas kyi dpon por seng ger gyur te/ de'i lhag ma za ba wa
446a2(1): lnga brgya rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing ri la nye bar brten te gnas so// seng ges srog chags rnams bsad de sha'i dam pa dang / khrag gi dam pa 'thungs nas bor te 'gro bas/ 
446a3(1): de rnam/ de lta bus dus ring mo zhig 'das par gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nA ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge mtshan mo srog chags tshalA na/ 'khron par lhung ba dang / wa lnga brgya pa
446a4(1): de rnams las wa lnga brgyar cig gi ma tshang ba so sor dong ste/ wa cig zhig seng ge la rtog cing 'khron pa'i khar 'dug ste gang gis na 'di phyin par gyur pa'i thabs de ci yod
446a5(1): skam sems shing / de 'khron pa'i nyen kor du phan tshun song ba las/ ji tsam na khron pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ mtshe'u zhig mthong nas de brtags na phyog gcig
446a6(1): nas 'og zus bcug ste/ khron pa de mtshe'u'i chus bkang ba dang seng ge rang nyid byung bar gyur to// lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ stobs che ba'am gzhan yang rung / 
446a7(1): grogs pa dag bya dgos te// was ni khron pa rnyid pa nas// seng ge byung bar gyur la ltos// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi seng ge gang yin pa de ni
446a8(1): nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gcig pu ni dge slong kun dga' bo yin no// wa gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang gang yin pa de ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin de/ 
446b1(1): de na yang 'di dag gis ra yongs su btang gis kun dga' bos ni yongs su ma btang ngo // da ltar yang 'di dag gis nga yongs su btang gi kun dga' bos yongs su ma btang
446b2(1): ngo // gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis yongs su btang na/ kun dga' bos nga yongs su ma btang ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa'
446b3(1): ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa phyogs shig na ri dgas lnga brgya'i ri dgras kyi dpon por gyur to// ji tsam na sngon pa zhig gis ri dwags rnams bshor ba'i phyir
446b4(1): mdzel dang sti dang rnyod rab tu mang po dag btsugs so// ri dgas kyi dpon po de pag rkyong zhing gnas pas/ 'khor lnga brgya dang ri dgas kyi nags na rgyu zhing der
446b5(1): dgas kyi tshogs rnams kyi sA la 'gro ba na sgris zin pa de mthong nas ri dgas thams cad ni bros so// ri dgas mo cig pu zhig tshogs kyi dpon po'i drung du 'dug go
446b6(1): ri dgas kyi dpon de 'bad kyang snyir bcad par mi nus shing de de ltar 'phra shags byed ri dgas mo des mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ snyi 'di gang gis gtsugs pa yis/ 
446b7(1): rngon pa de ni mchi lags kyis// skal chen po ni 'dab mdzad cig// ri dgas dam pa 'bang mdzod cig/ des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rmig pa sar btsugs 'dren kyang ni/ 
446b8(1): 'brang ba'i sI ni dam po yis// bdag gis rkang pa rab sbas kyi// bcad mi nus rkyen ci byar yod// de nas rngon pa de mda' dang gzhu lag na thogs shing gos rur smrig
447a1(1): bgos nas/ phyogs der phyin to// ri dgas mo des/ rjod pa de ni ri dwags kyi dpon po gas pa'i phyir/ skyib bas
447a2(1): 'anam 'a 'ong ba mdzang ngo // mtho nas kyang rings par rigs par tshigs su bcad de smras pa// sgo 'di gang gis btsugs pa yi/ rngon pa niH
447a3(1): lags kyis// sbrul chen po ni 'bang mdzi drug/ raM dgas dam pa'abad mdzod cig/ des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rigs
447a4(1): pasar btsugs rten kyang ni// 'brang ba'i sri ni dam po ni// bdag gis rkang pa rab smras kyi// gtsang mi rus ni ci byar yod// de nas ri
447a5(1): rigs mo'i snying stongs nas// rngon pa de'i mdun du mngon du song ste smras pa/ de la brten nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rngon pa gzhu ni phog
447a6(1): mdzod la/ rngon pa ral gri blang mdzod de// thog par bdag bkram de nas ni/ ri dwags dpon po la mdzod cig/ de nas rngon pa de ngo mtshar gyi
447a7(1): bsdus pa'i thos smras pa/ 'dir khyod kyi cing 'od des smrasmra pa/ khyim thabs s+ho// des de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 
447a8(1): bdag gis khyod kyang mi gsad la/ ri dgas dpon po'ang mi bsad par// skang du sdug pa'i khyim thab dang / khyod ni lhan cig
447b1(1): 'grogs par bya/ des kyang tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ ji ltar ston pa bdag dang ni// sdug pa'i khyim thabs dga' ba lhur/ 
447b2(1): de bzhin ma ljon pa'i banyen kun dang // lhan cig tu ni dga' 'gyur cig/ de nas rngon pa de lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes nas lhan
447b3(1): cig dong ngo // dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri dgas dpon po gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// 
447b4(1): de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dgas mo gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no// ri dwags gcig gis lnga brgyar mtshang ba gang ba
447b5(1): gang yin pa de dag ni/ dge slong gcig gis brgyar ma chang ba 'di dag nyid yin te/ den yangang yang
447b6(1): di dag gis yongasasabatang gi/ can dag chos so sa ma
447b7(1): btas/ da gyur yang nga'adi dag gis yos su btang gis can dga'ajas
448a1(1): ni yongs su ma btang ngo // dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha sbyin
448a2(1): rus pa dang bkur stir rul pa bcom pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgad sngar gyi 'di'anga'i shig tu ma zad de/ de ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ru
448a3(1): ba 'di snyed pa dang bkur stir rus pa bcom pa nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i phyogs gcig cig na/ pad+ma'i rdzing chen po zhig yod de/ de dang nye ba na glang po che zhig gnas so// 
448a4(1): phyogs gzhan ni gan wa zhig kyang gnas so ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na glang po che pad+ma'i rdzing de nas chu 'thungs nas 'gro ba dang / wa 'od des glang po che la smras pa/ thab mo bya ba'am la ma las
448a5(1): zu glang po ches bsams pa/ rul ba 'di nyon mongs spyi rdol can 'di/ gal te bdag gis rkang lag gis 'am/ snas sam mche ba'i bas na/ mi gtsang bas ma rung bar
448a6(1): gyur pas/ mdor na rul pa 'di ni rul pa kho nas bas dang snyam du bsams nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod ni rkeng lag gis mi bsad/ mche bas ma yin sas min
448a7(1): nul ba rul pas bsad bya bas/ khyod ni rul bas bsad par bya/ glang po mchis bsams pa/ lam bzur te song dang / gdon mi za bar 'di bdag gi rjes
448a8(1): bzhin 'ong ngo snyam du/ des ma bzur nas myur bar myur bar song ba dang / was bsams pa/ tshig tsam kho nas bdag gis 'di bcom pa yin te/ des na myur bar myur
448b1(1): bar zos so snyam nas/ de de'i rjes bzhin rjes banin 'brangs pa dang / glang po ches nye bar 'ongs par shes nas/ shugs drag pos de'i steng du drug pa bor bas phog nas shi bar
448b2(1): gyur to// dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sa gang yin pa de ni swa sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ den yang rul ba 'di rnal pas bcom mo// da ltar yang rul pa 'di rnyed pa
448b3(1): dang / bkur sti rul bas bcom mo// gzhan yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad bcod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
448b4(1): 'das kyi gzigs pa'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa chen po las legs par rgal bar gyur la/ lha sbyin gyi lta ba'i rjes su mthun par
448b5(1): myur ba gang lags pa de dag ni tshul ma lags pas ma rung bar gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'bara' shig tu ma zad de/ 
448b6(1): ji sngar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i tshig rgan pa de dag ni 'jigs pa chen po mas thar la/ la sbyin gyi tshe gtun pab gang yid bde dag ni tshus ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur pa de tor cig/ dge slong
448b7(1): dag sngon byung ba'i ri 'or 'ar zhig dang nye ban me tog dang 'bras bu dang chu phun sum tshogs pa ni spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po gnyis shig gnas te/ re re la yang 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya
448b8(1): yong / de na tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos gnyid mog po'i rmil mni/ bdag son po 'ang du 'khor lnga brgya dang zangs su bajug par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang skem sangs
449a1(1): breng de spyi bud zhes byed nas/ rnam ngo mnangs te rangs pa dang / spre'u tshogs te/ rmi lam bzlas par brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag mdangs gsum pas
449a2(1): rmi baM la mngan pa zhig gis gnas 'di nas dong ngo // spre'u rnams kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi ste bres par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rmi lam rno ba yin pas
449a3(1): bdag nyid chen po des tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos la smras pa/ bang gi gis rmi lam 'di 'dra barmis nas 'dod na/ gzhan du 'dong ngam/ de yid mches nas smras pa/ 
449a4(1): rmi lam du rmis so chog bden par 'gyur ram/ gal te khyod 'gron ni song shig/ kho bos ni spyod yul ches yangs par 'gyur mi 'gro'o// des yid mches par rig
449a5(1): nas bdag nyid kyi tshogs ded de dong ngo // ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri ror de na brar mo zhig tha ban yos rdo ban/ sdes pas lu gcig 'khyam zhing phyogs der byin nas/ de nas
449a6(1): de dag bza' bar brtsams pa dang / des ma gal dum gyis bstan pas me' bar bzhin rgyal po'i glang po che'i bres su zhugs pa dang / 'bar bri des glang po che'i bres
449a7(1): slegs te/ glang po che mang po ni ga tshig go// rgyal pos sman pa bklag ste smras pa/ glang po che mas tshig pa rnams la spyad ci mod/ sman pa de rnams kyi ning spre'u rnams
449a8(1): kyis ma rung bar byas nas des bsams spre'u rnams la sha gnyer ba'i dus la ba ba po sam du bsams nas smras pa/ lA spre'u 'anag gis glang po che rnams bsku
449b1(1): nuskyes par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsngo ba/ shes ldan gzhigs gon gyis shig/ de rnams kyis kyang rngon pa rnams la bsngo ba/ rngon pa rnams kyis
449b2(1): ri 'or gyi nyer kor na gnas pa'i spre'u thams cad bzung ste phul lo// sman ba yun ring po nas sha khong rjes su 'breng bas gson pa nyid du bzangs su bcug go// lngas tshigs su
449b3(1): bcad de smras pa/ grong rdam dang ni grong khyer na/ mi mthun yod par gnas mi bya// lug dang zan mo ma mthun pas// spre'u rnams nI brlag par 'gyur/ dge slong ga
449b4(1): ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po rmis marno ba gang yin pa de rnying nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon pa cig shos gang yi
449b5(1): de ni sna sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang nga'i tshig rlan pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jigs pa chen po las thar to// lA sbyin gyi tshig tAn pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ tshul ma yin pas
449b6(1): ma rung bar gyur to// daltar yang nga'i lnga ba'i rjes su 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa chen po las rab tu thar to// lA spyir gyi lte ba'i rjes su
449b7(1): mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas mi rung bar gyur na/ gzhan yang nga'i bsdu ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de ga ma bde legs su
449b8(1): bar gyur cing sa sbyin gyi bsnga pa'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin ngas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de 'on cig/ dge slong
450a1(1): dgra sngon byung ba phyogs shig na spre'u'i tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya pa gnyis shig gnas so// de nas cig shos tshogs dang lhan cig sngangs
450a2(1): su dong ste/ rim gyis ri 'or zhigatu phyin pa dang / re 'or den shing kim pA ka zhes bya ba'ibras bus yal g.yur za bar 'dug nas/ spre'u rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po la smra sa
450a3(1): ba/ tshogs kyi dpon pa ljon shing ldog par 'i bris bus yal ga yur bzhig mchis kyis/ 'o skol du bapa 'bras bu rnams gsol lo/ tshogs kyi dpon pos shing de sa
450a4(1): brtags nas/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ grong gi nang na 'dug kyang ni// byis pa 'di lam zos kyang // rjes su dpag smanas shing 'di khri// 'bras bu bzar mi rung
450a5(1): bar shes/ zhes smras nas dong ngo // tshogs kyi dpon po cig shes kyang / tshogs de nyid kyi rjes bzhini rjes bzhin 'brangs nas/ rim gyis ri 'or du phyin pa dang / spre'u
450a6(1): rnams kyis ki ma ba ki'i ston shing de mthong nas/ de rnams kyis tshogs kyi dngo bo la smras pa/ tshogs kyi dpon po ljon shing 'bras du mchis kyis/ 'o skal du ba par
450a7(1): 'bras bu rnams la gsol bar bde bar bzhung ngo // des smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shin// de rnams kyis zos pa dang / thams cad tshul ma yin
450a8(1): par sdugs za bar gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dras kyis dpon po dang po pa gang yin pa de ning nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus dpon po gnyis pa
450b1(1): gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang nga'i blta ba'i rjes su maldan par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde legs su dong ngo // swA sbyin gyi blta ba'i rjes su mthun par
450b2(1): par 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dasbyar yang nga'i blta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur ba gang yin pa de drug ni/ bde legs su 'khod
450b3(1): pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las rnas do// swA sbyin byas pa'i rjes su mthor bar gyur pa gang min de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur to// gang gi tshe lnga sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das
450b4(1): bkrongs pa'i phyir rdo ba'i phangs pa de'i/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'khrugs nas/ lA s+thir gsad kyis 'dong ngo // zhes byas pa dang / 'jig rten ni mdza' ba da / 
450b5(1): mdza' bdang / bar ma dag yod pas gzhan zhig gis lnga sbyin la spyan nas/ de skra gnas shing drung nig tu brten te/ spyod lam ni ba'i 'jug go// de rnams kyi de ltar spyod lam ni bar
450b6(1): mthong nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa shes ldan dgas sbyin bdag nyid chen po 'di/ bcom ldan 'das grongs par gas 'gyur/ kha cig gis bdag cag bsdus kyis tshur 'dod do// 
450b7(1): zhes de rnams 'dong ngo // dge slong rnams kyis swA sbyin delta bu'i spyod sam gyis gnas pas des ni grong mi 'khrugs kyang zabasad / zhes thos nas/ de rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom
450b8(1): thams ca cang ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa'i dus btsun pa latsun gyi chos sa bu'i sgongs 'jig rten bkrus pal gzigs btsa na 'das kyis bka' dul ba
451a1(1): sred dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' ni gtum pad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di tshes lta bu'i sgonas bye ba rnams brid pa de 'on cig/ dge slong dag sngon/ 
451a2(1): byung ba phyogs shig na/ bye ba rnams kyi dpe tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya pa zhig gangs so// bye ba la me skyes zhes bya ba zhig yod do// de bzhon pa'i gnas ska/ 
451a3(1): na/ phyogs gang tu gnas pa'i nyen kor du/ des bya ba thams cad bsad do// de yang dus gzhan zhig na rgas par gyur do rgas pas pha rol ma gnon pas byi ba
451a4(1): bzung mi nus nas des bsams pa// sngon bdag gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na ni/ pha rol gnon pas byi ba 'dzin nus na/ da ni ma nus de 'on kyang
451a5(1): thabs shig bsham la bza'o snyam nas/ de 'jab cing byi ba rnams btsal bar brtsams te/ des btsal ba na byi ba lnga brgya'i tshogs yod par shes nas/ 
451a6(1): de byi ba de rnams kyi khung bu dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu ngan g.yo dka' thub byed pa na/ byi ba rnams phan tshun la byams pas spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa/ 
451a7(1): mthong nas/ de rnams kyis rgyung ring por 'dug nas smras pa/ nad po ci byed des smras pa/ kho bo bzhon pa'i gnas skabs na/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang
451a8(1): byas pas/ de bad par bya ba'i bIr dka' bstod de// de rnams kyis 'dis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa spangs so zhes de la chos kyi rgyu las byung / 
451a9(1): ba'i dad pa skyes par gyur to// de rnams de la ni ma re re zhing bskor ba bya nas/ 'khung zar 'jug pa na/ des de rnams kyi nang nas tha ma bzung zhing po
451b1(1): zhing bza'o// ji tsam na tshogs de bsgribs nas/ tshogs kyi dpon pos bsams pa/ bdag gi byi ba rnams ni nyung bar gyur la/ byi la 'di ni 'am skyes par
451b2(1): gyur pas/ 'di la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des byi la brtag par rtsams pa dang / ji tsam na drug pa sgra can du mthong nas/ des bsams pa// 
451b3(1): gdon mi za bar 'dis byi ba rnams bsad par gyur kyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di mngon sum du bab par bya'o snyam nas/ des de mi mngon pa'i sa
451b4(1): nas brtags lhur len cing gnas pa na/ de tsam nA des de tha ma'i byi ba za ba mthong nas/ de de logs su song ste/ rgyang por 'dug nas tshigs su
451b5(1): bcad de smras pa/ zhang po yan lag rgyas gyur cing // bdag gi tshogs ni 'gribs 'gyur la// 'bras bu rtsa ba za ba'i rtug pa sgra can mi 'byung bas// 
451b6(1): dka' thub 'di chos dka' thub min/ dka' thub 'di ni don phyir te/ byi ba rnams ni 'gribs 'gyur bas/ me skyes khyod ni bkra shis shog/ dge slong
451b7(1): dgA ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byi la ma skyes zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lA s+t+waM yin te/ de na yang 'dis chos 'di
451b8(1): bu'i sgo nas bye ba rnams zos so// da ltar yang 'dis chos 'di lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bsdus so// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams
451b9(1): bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzigs pa'i rjes su mthun par gyur gang lags pa de dag bde ba dang leg sa
451b10(1): ma pa'i 'phrog dgon pa las rgal cing / lA sbyin gyi blta ba'irjes su mthun
452a1(1): par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni tshus ma lags pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ dge slong dag da lta
452a2(1): gyi 'ba' shig tum zad de/ ji sngar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i lba ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde ba dang legs pare 'brog dgon pa nas tha~Mr la/ lha sbyin gyi blta ba'i
452a3(1): rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngor byung ba/ tshong dpon gnyis shig shing rnga lnga brgya lnga brgya dang lhan cig tshong
452a4(1): sbyar zhing dgon pa'i wab zhig tu zhugs te/ de gnyis dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa na/ glang rnams ni res 'ga' ni rtswa nyung / res 'ga' ni chu nyung / res 'ga' ni med do// de nas tshong pa de
452a5(1): glang rnams dang bcas te/ lhag par drub pas sdug bsngal gyis dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa lA/ phyogs gcig na gsing ma dang chu phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ tshong pa rnams kyis der
452a6(1): glang rnams btang / rang rang khrus byas nas chu mang du 'byungs/ de nas glang chu chungs pa dang / rtswa nyungs pas yongs su drab pas de rnams kyis rtswa 'drangs par zos te ngal sos pa dang / 
452a7(1): de rnams kyi nang na glang gtso bo gang yin pa des de rnams la shes par byas/ shes ldan dag bdag cig rtsu na du dang chu chu dus yongs su du bya ba las/ phyogs 'di'i gsing ma dang rgyu
452a8(1): phun sum tshogs pa yin gyis gal te khyod cag 'dod na 'di nyid du then te 'dug par bya'o// glang gtso bo cig shos kyis rang gi tshogs rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rmi
452b1(1): rnams ni mthu dang ldan zhing 'dul dka' ba 'dul par byed pa yin gyis/ gnod pa zab par 'gyur du 'ong bas bdag cag kha' ji ltar bkal bde bzhin du khyer cig/ de skad ces smras
452b2(1): glang gtso bo cig shos khros nas rang gi tshogs rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag zla ba'i rgyab sus mthong / 'di dag khal khyer la rag/ yu bus ni mi bkur ro/ ci tsam na
452b3(1): tshong pa rnams kyis glang rnams bsdad par brtsams pa nang / gleng de rnams phyi leng byed cing 'dug pa dang / tshong pa rnams kyis mang du brdegs shing lcags gzer bu can gyis gzhus
452b4(1): bas khrag shing shing rta dang sbyar to// gzhan ni cang mi byed par khal mnos pas de dag la cung kyang ma byas so// las tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ glang gis pa glang 'di dag ni/ 
452b5(1): log pa dag tu gdams pas na/ rma dga' byung zhing khrag 'dzag la/ stsogs shing skams pa dag bltos/ glang gis ba lang 'di dag ni/ legs pa dag gtams bas
452b6(1): de rnams dgon pa las rgal nas/ bsil ba'i chu ni 'thung bar bsngos/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gi gtso bo legs par ston pa gang yin pa de ni
452b7(1): de nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gi gtso bo slu bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni lnga sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang nga'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ bde ba dang legs par
452b8(1): dgon pa nas rgal to// lha sbyin gyi tshi gzhan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshus ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to// desngar yang nga'i blta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag
453a1(1): mi bde ba dang legs par 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rgal do// sA sbyin gyi blta ba'i rjes su mthun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshub
453a2(1): ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lnga sbyin blun zhing 'khor
453a3(1): blun pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bA ka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang lha sbyin blun zhing 'khor blun pa de zhen
453a4(1): cig/ dge slong dag de sngor byung ba degon pa'i gnas shig na/ spre'u'i tshogs shig gnas te/ de 'khyam pan khron par zla ba'i gzugs brnyan sher ba mthong nas/ tshogs kyi dpon pos
453a5(1): smras pa/ shes sngan dag zla ba khron par spyad gyis 'jig rten zla ba med par bya'am cing byung ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs kyis dbyung ngo // de gros bya bar brtsams pade rje
453a6(1): lder dbyung bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de ji mi shes sam/ spre'u brgyus lang dbyung mod ces/ de rnams kyi spre'u brgyus te dang po bas shing gi yal galas 'jus nas/ de'i
453a7(1): 'jug ma la gzhan gyis 'jus shing de la yang gzhan gyis 'jus te/ de bzhin du thams cad 'jus pas/ yal gsug par g.yur zlos so// chu glongs pa dang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan
453a8(1): yang mi mngon par gyur/ yal g.yang chaganas thams cad khron par srungaste/ tshus ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'din blun po gang dag
453b1(1): 'dres pa thun pa yod gyur pa/ de dag thams cad brlag gyur te// rtsu ba'i byin pa'i snga'u bzhin / dge slong dag de cis mdu sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sde tshogs kyi
453b2(1): dpor po gang yin pa de ni lha sbyir 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di blun zhing 'khor yang blun pa yin no/ daskar yang blun zhing 'khor yang blun pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
453b3(1): 'das la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chos mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ra bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis las
453b4(1): byas shing tshogs rnyed parkyen yongs su gyur pa/ dong pa bzhin du na par gnas pa gdo mi za bar byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dge byas shing bsags pa 'di nyid kyi las byas shing bsags
453b5(1): bdag gzhan su zhig gis sa sor myong bar 'gyur/ las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams sa rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dgal
453b6(1): 'bras bur gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gdon mi za bar A sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'duna'i byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu lngas na dge 'dun dbye
453b7(1): bar mi 'gyur te/ re shig dang por sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe/ dge 'dun dbye bar mi 'gyur te/ kye me'o grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes
453b8(1): phrag go nas/ 'jig rten des phyogs pas so// ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma dge 'dun dbye bar mi 'gyur te/ gang lal nig 'di skad du/ ra
454a1(1): ston pa yin no zhes zeran/ de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhugs shing 'tshol ba zhes pa de'i tshe/ khyod gar song zhes brjod par
454a2(1): zad pas so// lta ba'i nyes pa dang tshul khrims kyi nyes pa'i nyes pa ma byung ba'i tshe/ nyan thos zung mchog tu ma bstan pa'i tshe dge 'dun dbye bar mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
454a3(1): dge 'dun dbye ba gdon mi za bar nyan thos zung gis sdums byed pas so// mtshams ma bcad par na dge 'dun dbye bar mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshams kyi nang du
454a4(1): dge 'dun dbye bar mi 'gyur gyi/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu ni ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyon med pa las/ tshul khrims
454a5(1): kyi skyor dang lta ba'i sbyor byung ste/ tshul khrims kyi skyon ni ka lan+da ka'i bu bzang sbyin las byung ngo // lta ba'i skyor yang dge slong 'chi ltas kyis phyung bas/ gdon mi za bar swa sbyin gyis dge
454a6(1): 'don 'byed par 'gyur gyis me lang rgyal po'i khabadud byar bzhugs par dab bci'o snyam mo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di sam du dgongs te/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i gang za bo rnams dang
454a7(1): thabs cig rgyal po'i khab du gshegs na/ lnga sbyin gyis dge 'dun dbyed bya bar mi nus kyis/ malang so so'i skye bo dge ba'i gang zag rnams dang thabs cig 'gro'o snyamaste/ mnyan ma
454a8(1): du ji tsam gnod kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ rim gro byed pa'i tshing nga ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i kha ba gang na bder gshegs pa na/ rgyal po kha
454b1(1): tu byon do// 'dul ba gzhi dam bu ba nI pa/ bam po brgya A pA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal
